Jingle peacefully lives in Capatan with her loving husband and three young children. She is now thirty-three years old and manages a small piggery in their village. She fattens and breeds hogs to sell and gains about PHP 5,000 for each hog sold. 

She is now asking for a loan of PHP 14,000 to buy vaccines and medicines for the sustainability of her hogs. She hopes to keep ensuring she has healthy hogs to raise so she can sell them at a higher cost upon distribution. 

Jingle hopes to achieve a more profitable business and save for her children's education. She will be happy to see them professionals in their chosen career someday.

loans.use: to buy vaccines and medicines for the sustainability of her hogs.

loans.name: Domitilio

texts.en:
Domitilio is a hog raiser from Capatan. He fattens and breeds them for sale upon achieving the desired weight. He has been in his business for over 10 years now. Domitilio lives with his wife and youngest child. He has five children. His youngest child still pursuing college, the rest have settled into marriage and live far from him. 

Domitilio would like to keep making his business profitable so he is now asking for additional capital of PHP 25,000 to buy five sacks of feed, medicines and vaccines for hogs. he hopes to continuously give nourishment to his hogs so he will sell them at higher cost and earn more income which will lead to financial stability someday.

loans.use: to buy five sacks of feed, medicines and vaccines for hogs.

loans.name: Imelda

texts.en: Imelda is 47 years old and lives in the community of Manaring in Isabela Province. Imelda keeps busy everyday selling different vegetables and fruits from the community. She sells her products from house to house in her neighborhood. During her hectic schedule, she makes sure that she also spends time with her family. She is a loving and hardworking mother who ensures that she cooks for her children and her spouse, Wilson. To generate additional income, she is requesting a loan of 17,000 PHP to buy string beans, squash and tomatoes to expand her business and ensure that she can give the family its daily needs.

loans.use: to buy string beans, squash and tomatoes for her business.

loans.name: Lai

texts.en:
Lai is 50 years old. She is married and resides with four children in Prey Veng Province, Cambodia. She has been working in a pepper plantation for more than a year, earning approximately $6 daily. Her husband is employed in the plantation as well. He earns about $6 per day. One of her children is employed in a garment factory and earns about $2 each day. 

Due to the difficulty in her family’s transportation, Lai is requesting a loan of $1,000 to purchase a motorbike for commuting. This purchase would enable her to use the saved money on her transportation expenses to support the family. In the future, she would like to build a new house and send her children to a good school.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike for commuting.

loans.name: Imelda

texts.en:
Imelda is 43 years old, married, and has three children. Imelda's husband is a tricycle driver. Imelda is managing a general store. She has invested all of her loans in maintaining her general store and has managed to keep it running with a great deal of commitment on her part. 

With this new loan of PHP 8,000 PHP, Imelda will buy a variety of products that she can display in her store, such as soap, milk, canned goods, noodles, crackers and cookies. This will enable her to have a better store and more products to sell to her customers who come to her store every day to buy from her. She is grateful to ASKI for the loans they have given her before and she is hoping her new loan is approved.

loans.use: to buy soap, milk, canned goods, noodles, crackers and cookies to sell.

loans.name: Margilita

texts.en: Margilita, 52, is from the village of Manaring in Isabela Province. She is married and has grown-up children. To make a living, Margilita operates her own manufacturing business, manufacturing and selling charcoal to local businesses and community members. Margilita has been engaged in her business for over 4 years and earns approximately 5000 PHP a month. The 7,000 PHP loan that she is requesting now will be used to purchase raw materials to manufacture additional products. It will be Margilita's first loan from ASKI. She plans to use the additional revenue to further improve and expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase raw materials for manufacturing charcoal.

loans.name: Chhet

texts.en:
Chhet is 49 years old. She is married and a mother of four children. Two of her children are working to help the family’s finances while the other two are studying in a local school in the province. Chhet generates her income from farming activities and a vegetable selling business. In the market, she has rented a booth for selling vegetables which she purchases from her suppliers early each morning. She has been a vendor for a few years. 

Chhet would like to improve the business and increase the number of her customers. What she really needs at the moment is a suitable transportation for taking her vegetables to the marketplace. Plus, she will be able to distribute her products to different places for a better income. To make it possible, Chhet decided to borrow a loan through HKL to purchase a motorcycle along with a trailer for transporting her vegetables. Chhet hopes that Kiva lenders will give her help in order to make improvements to her current business. She is very cheerful and grateful.

loans.use: to purchase a motorcycle along with a trailer for transporting her vegetables.

loans.name: Salvador

texts.en:
Salvador is a proud and experienced farmer who grows rice in Roma Sur. He has been in the farming business for almost 20 years and learned farming practices from his parents. Salvador is now 52 years old and has two children. His wife also manages a small store for additional income. They work hard for the family's sustenance. They usually earn PHP 30,000 each month from their businesses. 

Now, Salvador would like to keep improving his crop production. He is requesting a loan of PHP 50,000 to invest in farm inputs necessary for good nutrition for his crops so that he can harvest them profitably. He will buy fertilizers and insecticides for use in farming. Additional revenue will be invested for school fees for his children and in the retail business. 

With good income from their businesses, Salvador and his wife will achieve income stability someday.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and insecticides for use in farming.

loans.name: Maricel

texts.en:
“Time is gold” is the guiding principle of Maricel in life. Maricel is 29, married and has two children. She operates a business venture planting rice crops in their field. Maricel’s children are going to elementary and high-school.

Maricel and her husband are both farmers. They dream of their children finishing their education and becoming professionals someday. They don’t have a higher education and so can't apply for better work so as to be able to sustain their children's needs better. Farming is their only source of income. Sometimes they work as laborers on their neighbor’s farm to generate additional income for the family. The couple is striving to achieve their dream.

Maricel noticed that farm inputs on the market are costly. Her income from her previous crop is not enough to provide for her farm needs. She made a decision to borrow a loan amounting PHP 42,000 to pay for the cultivation of their farm, buy seeds and fertilizers to use. She hopes to avail of the loan and manage well the business.

loans.use: to pay for the cultivation of their farm, buy seeds and fertilizers to use.

loans.name: Narain

texts.en:
Narain is 29 years old. She is single and lives with her parents in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. She has been working in a garment factory for more than five years, earning approximately $4 per day. 

Narain is requesting a loan of $1,000 to purchase construction materials to build a kitchen and a bathroom. This money will help her provide hygienic living conditions for her family. In the future, she would like to run a tailoring shop at home and build a new house.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials to build a kitchen and a bathroom.

loans.name: Yong

texts.en:
Yong is 55 years old. She is married and resides with five children in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. She is a homemaker. Her husband is a motor taxi driver who earns about $3 daily. Three of her children are employed. They earn about $8 per day. 

In order to improve her family’s finances, Yong is requesting a loan of $500 to purchase farmland to use for farming. This purchase will help her acquire a new business and earn more income for the family. In the future, she would like to run a sewing shop for her children and help her children get higher education.

loans.use: to purchase farmland to use for farming.

loans.name: Phang

texts.en:
Phang, aged 29, is an active man who is very responsible for his family. He is married to a farmer and has a young child. Phang spends most of his day time working in the construction field where he can make an income of 5.00 USD per day to support his family. Also, he helps his wife to manage their farm during the rainy season in addition to his own business. Phang wishes to help his child finish his education and get a degree someday.
 
Phang is requesting a KHR 1,500,000 loan which will be used to pay for the medical care of his wife who will give birth to a baby very soon. He hopes his loan will be approved so that he can secure his situation and help his wife going through her hard time. He appreciates the loan help and he promises to pay back his loan in full.

loans.use: to pay for medical care of his wife who will give birth to a baby very soon.

loans.name: Dulce

texts.en:
Financial difficulty is the main problem for farmers, preventing them from planting their crops early to minimize pest and diseases. Dulce is one of those farmers that has difficulty in financing their farm. She chose to borrow a loan of PHP 42,000 from our organization to pay for the cost of cultivating, including buying seeds and fertilizers. 

Dulce hopes to use her loan wisely and manage the business well. The loan has made a big contribution to her ability to plant rice crops early. She will always assure that her crop is in good condition to generate higher income. Through farming she hopes to fulfill her family's needs quickly.

loans.use: to pay for the cost of cultivating, including the purchase of seeds and fertilizers.

loans.name: Leticia

texts.en:
Leticia is 50 years old and a village store owner in Yeban Sur province of Isabela. She is married to Mauricio and has four children. They live in a flood prone area in a former private hacienda. Due to the lack of financial resources and because some of her children lack the interest to study, they were not able to provide their children with higher levels of education. 

For 17 years, Leticia has been able to maintain her village store with the help of her husband and the financial support of a microfinance institution. She hopes to engage in another type of business in the future and to be able to support her husband in his farming needs since they no longer need to send their children to school. She knows that she must work hard in order to achieve her business plan someday and to avoid asking for credit from traders that offer high interest. 

Leticia would like to request a loan of PHP 10,000 that she will use to invest in her store and farming needs. She will use the money from the loan to buy canned goods, snacks food, crackers, cooking oil, and spices for her store.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks food, crackers, cooking oil, and spices for her store.

loans.name: Evangielyn

texts.en:
Evangielyn, 38, is married and has two school-age children. She manages a rice farming business in her village. Her husband is also a farmer; he is her partner in growing their rice crops in their field. Evangielyn usually earns 15,000 PHP from her crops.

Evangielyn earnings from the business usually cover her children's school fees. At present, Evangielyn does not have enough capital to provide farm inputs needed in their field. Thus, Evangielyn is asking for a loan of 27,000 PHP to buy seeds and herbicides for plant care. She hopes to gain profits that will financially sustain her children's needs in school.

loans.use: to buy seeds and herbicides for plant care.

loans.name: Chan

texts.en:
Chan is 34 years old and a resides in Kompong Speu province. She is married with a small child. Chan usually does farming in the rainy season and uses the rest of her time working as sewing staff for a local garment factory. Through her efforts, Chan is able to produce an income of 16,000 KHR each day to cover her daily costs. She has been a garment worker for more than a year and has spent ages on farming. Presently, she lives with her husband, her child and her mother.

Chan is applying for a loan from HKL and Kiva to purchase a motorcycle to be used for commuting. It will serve the family suitably and reduce their transportation fees. Chan hopes to increase her profit through saving on unnecessary expenses in order to better her living situation.

loans.use: to purchase a motorcycle to use for commuting.

loans.name: Im

texts.en:
Im is 44 years old and a proud farmer who manages a two-hectare rice farm in Kompong Speu province, Cambodia. She has been operating this type of business for more than 25 years. Im has a common-law husband, a carpenter and who is the father of their three unmarried children. Currently, one of their children helps them financially by working at a garment factory for a monthly salary.

With the requested loan, Im would like to purchase a motorcycle for her child to use to commute to his workplace. Therefore, he will be able to travel to work safely without paying for taxi services, as he has done in the past. Im hopes that she can afford to send the rest of her children to a good university when they finish high school.

loans.use: to purchase a motorcycle for her child to use to commute to his workplace.

loans.name: Antonino

texts.en:
Antonino is 44 years old. He is married to Alma, and they have children to support. He has been in the farming business for over 10 years and usually gains PHP 10,000 each harvest season, twice a year. He would like to keep making the business profitable but he has insufficient funds. He is asking for a loan of PHP 25,000 to buy fertilizers and pesticides for use in his farming business. These inputs will help sustain his crops and increase his crop production. 

Antonino is aiming for an abundant harvest in order to lift his family out of poverty.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and pesticides for use in farming

loans.name: Antonio

texts.en:
Antonio lives in Padul with his wife Wilma and four children. He is a carpenter and a farmer, too. Antonio plants and harvests rice in his one-hectare plot of land. He also hires laborers who help him do farming activities such as sowing, planting, and transplanting rice seedlings. Because of these additional labor costs, Antonio lacks funds to sustain his crops. He is asking for a loan of PHP 20,000 to buy fertilizers, insecticides, and pesticides for use in farming. 

In the future, Antonio would like to keep ensuring a good harvest from his farming business and someday achieve economic stability.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, insecticides, and pesticides to use in farming

loans.name: Angel

texts.en:
Angel is 57 years old, married to Flordelisa and they have one child. He manages a hectare plot of land which he cultivates, plants, and harvests rice on. He has been in this business for over 10 years now. He usually gains PHP 10,000 each harvest season which is used for their meals, bills at home, and revolving capital in the business.

Angel is now asking for a loan of PHP 13,000 to buy fertilizers and insecticides used in farming. He hopes to keep making his crops healthier and harvest them profitably.

Someday, Angel would like to ensure a profitable business so he can save for his family's future expenses.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and insecticides used in farming.

loans.name: Rutare Group

texts.fr:
Apollinaire fait partie du groupe  Rutare et habite à Gitega. Il a 35 ans et est mariée à Jeannette, une cultivatrice. Ensemble ils ont 5 enfants, le cadet est en premier année et l’aînée en cinquième année primaire.

Il fait le commerce  de banane depuis  6 ans.

C’est son premier crédit  à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’il  obtient, il va augmenter son capital et acheter  une grande quantité de  bananes  à revendre pour gagner plus.

Avec le profit de son commerce, il épargne,  paie les frais scolaires, assure les frais  de santé et  habille ses enfants.
texts.en:
Apollinaire lives in Gitega and is a member of the Rutare group. He is 35 years old and married to a farmer named Jeannette. They have five children, the youngest of whom is in the first year of primary school and the eldest of whom is in the fifth year of primary school.

Apollinaire has been selling bananas for six years now.

This is his first loan from Turame. With the KIVA loan that he obtains, he will increase his capital and buy a large quantity of bananas to resell in order to make more money.

He uses the profits from his business to increase his savings, pay school fees and medical fees, and buy clothing for his children.

loans.use: to increase his capital and buy a large quantity of bananas to resell so that he can earn more money

loans.name: Soun

texts.en:
Soun is 40 years of age. She is a married woman who resides in Kompong Speu province, Cambodia. Soun has worked as a market vendor for the past two years. She typically makes around 4.00 USD per day through selling. Her husband works in the construction industry and contributes his income to the family. Soun has four children who all still depend on her income and are attending school.

Soun has faced financial difficulty in the middle of renovating her house. That is why she would like to have a loan from HKL and Kiva to pour concrete over her ground floor. With the rest of the loan, she will support her children’s education. She would appreciate the generosity of the lenders who will enable her to obtain this loan.

loans.use: to pour concrete over her ground floor.

loans.name: Thua

texts.en:
Thua was born in 1971. She has two children. Her daughter is a student. Her son is a carpenter. Her husband is a carpenter. His income is about 7,000,000 dong [VND]. Thua has a grocery store to earn a living. She makes 6,000,000 dong (VND) a month from it. Her family’s total earnings are about 20,000,000 dong (VND) per month. 

She has participated in SEDA's credit program since 2008. In the last cycle, she borrowed 9,632,000 dong (VND) and repaid the loan on time. In this loan cycle, she would like to borrow 10,080,000 dong (VND) to buy noodles, canned food, candies and biscuits for her store. She wants to use the profit to enlarge her grocery store.

loans.use: to buy noodles, canned food, candies and biscuits to sell in her grocery store

loans.name: Pearson Group

texts.en:
Pearson group is comprised of five members belonging to a tribal community from Churachanpur, Manipur, which is in the northeastern part of India. In 2011, the group was formed and functions as a joint liability group to help one another.

Muonkim, with her hand raised, is the group leader. She is a widow and a mother of four sons. All her children go to an orphanage school nearby.  The eldest son, 12 years of age, is under the foster care of her parents. Muonkim lives with her other three sons and her mother-in-law. Being the sole earner of the family, her main source of income used to be a small shop where she sold cigarettes, paan and the like. 

With her first loan of INR 5000 and help from her parents and friends, she started a clothing business because she believed she was able to make more profits to provide for her family. Initially, she sold clothes door to door, but now with her second loan of INR 10,000 and with some of her savings, she was able to construct a small store where she sells clothes now. She named her store “Flying Business” and employs one of her nieces to run the store while she is engaged in bringing in clothes to sell. She deals in mostly ladies garments such as warm pants, sweaters, tops, T-Shirts and half-pants for kids. To be precise, she sells clothes according to the season  
 
She usually goes to Dimapur in Nagaland, a neighbouring state, to buy clothes for her store. She also visits Moreh town (Bordering Myanmar- 180 km away) for the same purpose according to the demands and convenience.

With great hopes, she plans to save as much as possible until her children come of age where money will be a deciding factor if she will be able to support their higher education. She said, “I dream that one day my sons will protect and feed me. It is my responsibility to give them a good education so that they may get employment opportunities when their time comes. This thought and hope wants me to live another day.”

She requested another loan to increase her stock of winter clothing such as sweaters, warm pants, tops and warm stockings for ladies as well as for kids. She plans to invest the whole loan amount on these items. 

The other group members are also working very hard and conducting group meetings twice a month to share and guide each other to do better with their respective business. They all needed another loan in order to stock their inventory with the Christmas celebration and Thanksgiving looming ahead. The group members' income-generating activities include a butcher shop, charcoal sales, supplying fresh and organic vegetables in the market and a clothing shop.

loans.use: To buy winter garments such as sweaters, warm stockings, jackets and pants for kids to sell.

loans.name: Daisy

texts.en:
Daisy's business focuses on computer games and video rentals. She has been running this kind of business since 2000. Her spouse is a technician of air conditioners and refrigerators. Daisy and her spouse have been blessed with three children: her eldest child is married while her two other children are still studying.

Daisy plans to buy a PS2 player, tv and video player but her capital intended for her business is no longer sufficient. She is seeking financial support amounting to 20,000 Philippine pesos (PHP). She knows that this loan amount would keep her business developing. Daisy hopes and prays that lenders will continue to support her financially. In this way, she could educate her two children and improve their way of living.

loans.use: to buy a PS2 player for her rental computer games, tv and video player for her video sales business

loans.name: Loreto

texts.en:
Loreto describes himself as an industrious and hard working man. He is married with six children. Three of his children have settled for marriage while the other three are still studying.

Loreto's wife is a hog raiser while he is engaged in a transportation business. According to him, it's been his fourth time to changed his motorcycle transport because it's no longer usable in transporting passengers and some of the spare parts are destroyed. Now he would like to borrow a loan of 10,000 Philippine pesos (PHP) which will be use for the repair and maintenance of his motorcycle side car. In addition, he will use some of the amount in buying two piglets and hog feed. Loreto believes that his sacrifices and patience will lead him to obtain his goal in life.

loans.use: to repair his motorcycle side car and buy two piglets

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Aristotle

texts.en:
Aristotle has owned a tailoring business for more than ten years. He is happily married and has two children. Aristotle both stands as father and mother to his children due to his wife working in another country.

Aristotle repairs and make different kinds of clothing within his village. Since his tailoring business has improved, he put up his tailoring stall at Public Market of Santiago. He is indeed glad and happy for continuous development of his business. Since then, his costumer patronized his finished products due to their good quality and favorable prices. Now he is requesting for additional working capital of 10,000 Philippine pesos (PHP) to allow him to buy stock yarn of garments and different kinds of threads and needles. He knows that this amount of loan would lead him to succeed in life and with his business.

loans.use: to buy yarn of garments for his tailoring business

loans.name: Editha

texts.en:
Editha has been engaged in an agricultural business particularly raising crops and pigs. She started her livestock in the year 1994. Editha is happily married having four grown up children. 

Editha raised four fattening and one sow. She is grateful because her through her agricultural business she is able to educate her four children and give them a comfortable lifestyle. Editha still aims for progressive business so she adopts new techniques in proper care of pigs to fulfill her dreams in life.

Editha is now seeking for additional working capital amount of 40,000 Philippine pesos (PHP) allowing her to buy hog feed. Some amount will also be used for farm supplies for her farming business. She hopes for continuous growth of her business so she can have a viable source of income since she is getting old already.

loans.use: to buy hog feed and some amount will be used for her 2.5 hectares of farm land

loans.name: Christopher

texts.en:
Farming and hog raising has been the primary source of income of Christopher's family. He graduated with a Bachelors of Science in Animal Husbandry in the year 1999. After his graduation, he started raising pigs because he wanted to help his parents in generating income and getting ahead of life.

As the days passed by, his knowledge in proper care of animals helprf him much, most especially to increase his profit. In the year 1999, he settled down  for marriage and now he has been blessed with two children. Christopher's career doesn't stop from little success, instead he let this success be a stepping stone for continuous growth and development of his farming and livestock business.

With his determination and dreams in life, again, he is asking for more capital amounting to 50,000 Philippine pesos (PHP). He will use this loan amount in buying sacks of livestock feeds, essential vitamins for his hogs and some farm supplies needed in the improvement of his corn crop production.

loans.use: to buy sacks of livestock feeds, essential vitamins for his hogs and farm supplies for his farming business.

loans.name: Vilma

texts.en:
Vilma is 38 years of age and married. Her aim in life is to enter college but due to lack of finances, she enrolled in a vocational course pertaining to sewing. After her graduation, she decided to enhance and apply her knowledge in generating income.

Vilma has now been engaged in a sewing services for 19 years. She is really thankful to the lenders because her previous loan was used to purchase a stretch sewing machine, garments and threads which helped her increase her profit. Aside from sewing, she is also engaged in a livestock business.

Vilma also sews bridal gowns and accepts repairs to all kinds of clothing. At this time, she has plenty of job orders, so she is in need of additional working capital which will be use to buy stocks of garments and threads. In this situation, she requested a loan of PHP 7,000. She knows that this loan amount will keep her business growing continually.

loans.use: to buy garments and threads for her sewing business.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: Julio tiene 49 años de edad es divorciado, tiene 1 hijo de 18 años de edad. El empezó su negocio de alquiler de lavadoras hace 20 años atrás. En la actualidad el trabaja alquilando lavadoras en una trcicimoto que él  compro hace el año pasado con el primer crédito que solicito. Con el crédito comprara lavadoras, secadoras, y arreglara su tricimoto. Su meta es tener un local propio para luego implementar una lavandería completa
texts.en: Julio, 49, is divorced; he has an 18-year-old son.  He started his washing machine rental business 20 years ago and currently works leasing washing machines using a three-wheel, motorcycle-driven cart he bought last year with the first loan he requested.  He will use this loan to buy washing machines, dryers and to repair his vehicle.  His goal is to have a locale of his own to set up a complete laundry.

loans.use: to buy washers, dryers and to repair his vehicle.

loans.name: Hilda Antonia

texts.es: Hilda vive  en el Fortín zona norte de la ciudad de Guayaquil. Ella es madre soltera tiene un hijo de 6 años que estudia en una escuela. Comenzó hace 5 años atrás dando la apertura a una tienda de víveres en general  por su sector ya que vio la necesidad de sus vecinos ya que  no había ninguna tienda de víveres cerca de su casa. Ella comenzó vendiendo atún, aceite, colas. El sueño de Hilda es tener un mini market . Con el préstamo ella quiere comprar víveres en general como  aceite, azúcar, arroz, etc.
texts.en:
Hilda lives in Fortín, in the northern part of the city of Guayaquil.  She's a single mother who has a six-year-old child who's in school.

Five years ago she started opening a grocery store in her neighborhood because she saw the need for her neighbors, who didn't have any store close to home.  She began selling tuna, oil, and soda.  Hilda's dream is to have a small supermarket.

With the loan she wants to buy general provisions such as oil, sugar, rice, etc.

loans.use: to buy oil, sugar, rice, etc.

loans.name: Elsy Elizabeth

texts.es: Elsy vive en el fortín zona norte de la ciudad de Guayaquil. Ella tiene 25 años de edad es divorciada tiene un hijo de 7 años de edad y estudia en una escuela pública. Empezó con el sueño desde muy temprana edad de tener un gabinete de belleza y fue  hace  8 años atrás que su sueño se hizo una realidad porque dio la apertura a un gabinete en su casa.En la actualidad abre su gabinete de lunes a domingo desde la 9 de la mañana hasta las 9 de la noche. Al pasar los dias sus clientes  han  ido incrementando por lo que quiere mejorar su gabinete . Con el crédito quiere comprar tintes, máquina para cortar cabello, cremas etc. Su meta es ampliar su gabinete para satisfacer al cliente y así mejorar la calidad de vida de su hijo
texts.en:
Elsy is 25 years old and lives in the northern part of the city of Guayaquil. She is divorced and has a 7-year-old son who attends a nearby public school. Since she was young, Elsy has dreamed of opening her own beauty salon. After eight years of planning, she was able to open her business that she now runs out of her home.

Currently, Elsy works in the salon Monday through Sunday from 9 a.m. to 9 p.m. As time has passed, her client-base has grown, which has helped her improve her salon little by little. With this loan, Elsy will buy dyes, hair-clippers, creams, and other items for her business. Her goal is to expand her beauty salon in order to satisfy her customers and, in this way, improve the quality of life of her son.

loans.use: to buy dyes, hair-clippers, creams, etc.

loans.name: Yolanda

texts.es: Yolanda vive en la ciudad de Duran provincia del Guayas. Se divorcio de su ex conviviente hace 10 años atrás y de esa relación tuvieron 2 hijos que ahora son mayores de edad por lo que son independientes. Comenzó con la ilusión de ser estilista profesional ya que su madre desde temprana edad le  enseño todo respeto a ser estilista. En la actualidad trabaja con la ayuda de uno de sus hijos, ella junto a su hijo trabaja de lunes a viernes desde las 8 de la mañana hasta las 9 de la noche. Con el crédito comprara tintes, maquina de cortar cabello, plancha de cabello, herramientas. Su meta es ampliar su negocio para así poder brindar un mejor servicio a sus clientes
texts.en: Yolanda lives in the city of Duran in Guayas Province.  She divorced her spouse ten years ago but has two adult children from that relationship; they live independently now.  She started out with the dream of becoming a professional hair stylist because her mother taught her everything related to hair styling when she was very young.  She currently works with one of her son’s help.  She and he work Monday through Friday from 8 in the morning until 9 at night.  She will use the loan to buy hair color, a hair clipper, a hair straightening comb and other tools.  Her goal is to enlarge the business to provide better customer service.

loans.use: to buy hair color, an elelctric clipper, a hair straightening comb and other tools.

loans.name: Ramon Enrique

texts.es: Ramón tiene 25 años de edad es casado y tiene un hijo. Él desde pequeño le llamo la atención la costura es por eso que  comenzó arreglándole la ropa a su familia después a sus vecinos y fue entonces que tomo la decisión de querer tener un negocio de sastrería. En la actualidad el sueño de Ramón se cumplió  porque tiene su taller de costura . El trabaja junto a su esposa de lunes a sábado desde las 8 de la mañana hasta las 6 de la tarde. Con el crédito quiere comprar máquina de coser, hilos, botones, etc. Su meta es comprar un local para así agrandar su negocio y llegar a ser  una empresa de confección de ropa para luego  poder contaratar a gente que no tenga trabajo
texts.en: 25-year old Ramón is married and has a son. Ever since he was young, he was attracted to sewing and so he started mending his family's clothes, then those of his neighbours. Finally he decided that he wanted to have his own dressmaking business. His dream has now been realized as he has his own workshop where he and his wife work six days a week from 8 am to 6 pm. With the loan Ramón wishes to buy a sewing machine, thread, buttons etc. His goal is to buy more premises and expand his business into a dressmaking company. Then he will be able to employ people who are out of work.

loans.use: To buy a sewing machine, thread, buttons etc.

loans.name: Violeta Del Carmen

texts.es: Violeta tiene 63 años de edad de estado civil divorciada tiene 3 hijos que son mayores de edad por lo que son independientes. Ella comenzó haciendo carteras bolsos de artesanía como una distracción pero luego se formo en un negocio. En la actualidad ella se decida a ser  monederos, bolso, maletas y los vende a diferentes sectores de su ciudad. Con el crédito comprara hilos, cierres, adornos etc. Su meta es tener un local propio para poder vender sus productos y no salir a las calles a venderlos
texts.en: Violeta, 63, is divorced; she has three adult children who are independent now.  She started out making purses and wallets as a crafts hobby but it grew into a business.  She currently makes coin purses, purses and suitcases that she sells in various parts of the city.  She will use the loan to buy tread, clasps, decorations, etc.  Her goal is to have a locale of her own to sell her wares in so she won’t have to go out in to the streets to sell any more.

loans.use: to buy thread, clasps, decorations, etc.

loans.name: Ndoc

texts.en:
Ndoc is in his sixties and has five children, ranging in age from twenty-four to thirteen years old. Three of them are still attending school. They have always lived in northern Albania. Ndoc is the only financial provider for his family and he has gotten an early retirement pension. In addition he’s been working as a service person at a gas station for the past five years. 

Ndoc’s family's house was in a very bad shape and he started to make major repairs some months back, but didn't have enough money to finish building it. This is the reason why he is requesting a loan now from Kiva, and he desperately needs lenders' financial assistance in this ordeal. There is an urgency to it, because winter is approaching and they have no safe place to stay.

Ndoc appreciates lenders' assistance and wants to thank each one of them in advance.

loans.use: To repair a rundown family home.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fabric, thread, and a sewing machine.

loans.name: Mariana Josefina

texts.es: Mariana es madre soltera tiene 3 hijos  el primero tiene 5 años el segundo 3 años y el ultimo tiene 1 año de edad, Ella comenzó en el  negocio  de cosméticos por catálogos gracias a que una amiga le dada productos para que ella venda eso a ella le gusto mucho. En la actualidad Mariana se independizo con la venta de cosméticos por catálogos. . La forma de trabajo es recorrer diversos lugares de la ciudad ofertando los productos entre amigos y conocidos.  Mariana por el momento no ha tenido ningún inconveniente en cuanto a la delincuencia y espera poder continuar de esta manera. Con el crédito piensa comprar, artículos de belleza como labiales, sombras, perfumes, cremas etc.
texts.en: Mariana’s a single mother; she has three children.  The oldest is five-years-old, the next is three and the youngest is one.  She started selling cosmetics via catalogue because a girlfriend of hers would give her products to sell and she liked it very much.  Mariana is now selling cosmetics independently via catalogue.  She works going from place to place in the city offering her products among friends and acquaintances.  For the moment she’s had no problems related to crime and hopes to continue that way.  She will use the loan to buy beauty products like lipstick, eye shadow, perfumes, creams, etc.

loans.use: to buy beauty products.

loans.name: Mariano

texts.es:
Matagalpa la perla del septentrión una ciudad muy bella y de gran importancia por su alto nivel de producción de café de esta ciudad es originario don Mariano, su edad es 55 años y tiene a su cargo tres hijos solo uno en edad escolar los demás no estudian.

Mariano a pesar de su edad es una persona con gran espíritu de superación y de mucha responsabilidad, actualmente se desempeña como fontanero de una empresa de servicio potable desde hace más de veinte años, demostrando honestidad y amor al trabajo.

La familia de Mariano ha crecido ya que ahora no solo desempeña el papel de padre si no también el de ser abuelo, y con el crédito va comprar un lote de terreno para apoyar una hija ya que es madre soltera.

Manifestó que siente alegre y motivado ya que espera hacer  posible unos de los sueños de su hija de obtener un solar para comenzar a construir su vivienda.
texts.en:
Matagalpa, the Pearl of the North, is a beautiful city with great importance for its level of coffee production. Mariano is a native of this city. He is 55 years old and is responsible for three children, only one of which is in school, the others are not.

Mariano, despite his age, is a person with a great spirit of improvement and much responsibility. He currently serves as a plumber for a drinking water service company and has for 20 years, demonstrating his honesty and love of the job.

Mariano's family has grown and now he not only plays the role of father, but also grandfather. With this loan he will buy a plot of land to support a daughter since she is a single mother.

He has shown he feels happy and motivated since he hopes to make one of his daughter's dreams possible, to obtain a plot and begin building her home.

loans.use: to buy a plot of land.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Diana Paola

texts.es: Diana es madre soltera tiene 2 hijos el mayor de 3 años y el menor de 1 año de edad. Ella siempre le ha gustado el comercio. En la actualidad ella vende colchones, ropas etc. Ella trabaja junto  a su madre de lunes a sábado de 8 de la mañana hasta las 6 de la tarde. Diana sale a vender sus colchones a distintas ciudades para así mantener a sus 2 hijos. Con el crédito quiere comprar ropa como short, pantalones y  vestidos, colchones etc. Su meta es tener un local propio vender su mercadería y no salir a las ciudades a vender para así darle un furo prospero para sus hijos
texts.en: Diana’s a single mother; she has two children.  The oldest is three-years-old and the youngest is one.  She’s always liked commerce.  She currently sells mattresses, clothes, etc.  She works with her mother from Monday through Saturday from 8 in the morning until 6 in the evening.  Diana goes out to various cities to sell the mattresses and support her two children.  She wants to use the loan to buy clothes like shorts, pants and dresses, mattresses, etc.  Her goal is to have a locale in which to sell her merchandise and not have to go to other cities any more to provide her children with a prosperous future.

loans.use: to buy clothes and mattresses.

loans.name: Edison Alberto

texts.es: Edison tiene 29 años de edad es casado no tiene hijos. El hace años atrás comenzó a vender ropa. En la actualidad trabaja como comerciante de ropa junto a su esposa de lunes a viernes desde la 8 de la mañana hasta las 6 de la tarde. Con el crédito comprara blusas, shorts, pantalones etc. Su sueño es poder tener un comercial de ropa y ser un gran empresario.
texts.en: Edison, 29, is married; he has no children.  He started selling clothes years ago.  He currently works as a clothes merchant with his wife Monday through Friday from 8am until 6pm.  He will use the loan to buy blouses, shorts, pants, etc.  His dream is to have a clothing store and to become a great businessman.

loans.use: to buy blouses, shorts, pants, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy dishes, pots, fish, plantain, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: purchase flour, eggs, butter, sugar, etc.

loans.name: Elsa María

texts.es:
La Señora Elsa forma parte del banco comunal El Crédito, este es su tercer crédito que realiza, vive por el sector de la Don Bosco en la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad es de clima frió, gracias a su geografía accidentada tiene grandes paisajes para disfrutar de la naturaleza, su centro se mezcla entre lo colonial y lo moderno, su cultura y tradiciones aun es conservada por sus habitantes.

La Señora. Elsa tiene 25 años de edad, es casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido una hija de 2 años de edad. Su esposo labora como obrero, la casa en la que viven es propia.

Doña Elsa trabaja de lunes a viernes en la venta de juguetes actividad que la desempeña desde muy joven ya que ha aprendido de su madre,  trabaja sin un horario fijo, el resto del tiempo pasa en casa se dedica a su hogar y al cuidado de su hija.
 
Su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de juguetes para ampliar su mercadería.

Su meta es terminar su casa y de comprarse un carro.
texts.en:
Elsa’s a member of the “El Crédito” communal bank and this is the third loan she’s taken.  She lives in the city of Cuenca’s Don Bosco sector.  This is a cold-weather city and because of its fractured topography it has great places to enjoy nature’s scenery.  Its city center blends colonial and modern and its residents still retain their culture and traditions.

Elsa’s 25-years-old, married and has a two-year-old daughter.  Her husband works as a laborer and they own the house they live in.  Elsa works Monday through Friday selling toys, an activity she’s been doing since she was very young since she learned it from her mother.  She works with no fixed schedule and spends the rest of her time at home caring for her daughter.  She will use her new loan to buy toys to increase her merchandise.  Her goal is to finish her house and to buy a car.

loans.use: to buy toys.

loans.name: Martha Isabel

texts.es:
La Señora. Martha forma parte del banco comunal El Crédito hace 2 años, vive por la parroquia de Baños en Cuenca, lugar que se encuentra rodeado de naturaleza, su gente se dedica al comercio, crianza de animales y a la agricultura, aun mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus padres.

La Señora. Martha tiene 28 años, es casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 2 hijos  de 4 y 2 años de edad,  su primer hijo está en el jardín. Su esposo es de profesión latonero (arreglo de las latas de los vehículos) y labora como empleado, la casa en la que viven es de propia.

La Señora Martha es toda una profesional en la rama de la belleza ya que ha estudiado para ello y ejerce su profesión hace 10 años, trabaja de lunes a sábados desde las 8 de la mañana hasta las 8 de la noche en su propio local.
 
Su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de tientes, gel, esmaltes, shampoo y más productos que le hace falta para su local.
 
Su meta es tener un vehículo.
texts.en:
Martha has been a member of the “El Crédito” communal bank for two years.  She lives in Cuenca’s Baños Parish, a place surrounded by nature.  Its residents are merchants, raise animals and work in agriculture; they still retain the culture and traditions of their ancestors.

Martha is 28-years-old, married and has two children who are 4 and 2 years old.  Her oldest son is in Kindergarten.  Her husband works as a ‘latonero’ (he repairs car bodies); he works as a salaried employee.  The house they live in his theirs.

Martha is a total professional in the beauty realm since she trained for it and has been exercising her profession for ten years.  She works Monday through Saturday from 8am until 8pm in her own beauty shop.  She will use her new loan to buy hair color, gel, nail polish, shampoo and other products she needs for her shop.  Her goal is to own a vehicle.

loans.use: to buy hair color, gel, nail polish, shampoo, etc.

loans.name: Rosa Nelly

texts.es:
La Señora Rosa es una socia del banco comunal El Crédito, vive en la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad es de clima frió, gracias a su geografía accidentada esta ciudad tiene grandes paisajes para disfrutar de la naturaleza, su centro se mezcla entre lo colonial y lo moderno, su cultura y tradiciones aun es conservada por sus habitantes.

Doña Rosa tiene 60 años de edad, está casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 6 hijos, 4 de ellos son casados y viven independientes, uno de sus hijos trabaja y le ayuda en la económicamente y su ultimo hijo que tiene 17 años estudia en un colegio de la ciudad. Su esposo le ayuda en su negocio ya que es jubilado, no tiene casa propia por lo que vive arrendando.

Ella trabaja desde hace 20 años en la venta de todo tipo de ropa, vende en su casa, a sus vecinas y conocidas, también trabaja realizando adornos de fantasía, se dedica a trabajar en estas actividades porque es un trabajo que le permite solventar los gastos del hogar y salir adelante con toda su familia. 

El crédito anterior lo ha invertido comprando ropa y la cancelación del crédito lo  realizado en las fechas correspondientes. Su nuevo crédito también lo va a invertir en la compra de ropa para su exigente clientela. La banca comunal le gusta porque en el grupo ya han conformado una familia y en cada reunión conversan de varios temas de su interés.
texts.en:
Rosa is a member of the “El Crédito” communal bank.  She lives in the city of Cuenca, a city with a cold climate.  Thanks to its fractured topography, this city has great scenery where nature can be enjoyed.  Its city center blends the colonial with the modern and its residents still retain its culture and traditions.

Rosa, 60, is married and has six children; four of them are married and live independently, one works and helps out economically and her youngest who is 17-years-old attends a local high-school.  Her husband helps her in her business since he’s retired.  She does not own a house; she’s a renter.

She has worked selling all types of clothes for 20 years.  She sells at home to her neighbors and acquaintances.  She also works making costume jewelry.  She works doing these things because it’s work that makes it possible for her to cover household expenses and to get ahead with her entire family.

She used her previous loan to buy clothes and she repaid it on the proper dates.  She will use her new loan to buy clothes too for her demanding clientele.  She likes the communal bank because they’ve become like a second family and they discuss various interesting topics at each meeting.

loans.use: to buy clothes.

loans.name: Rosa Narcisa

texts.es:
La Señora. Rosa es una socia del banco comunal El Crédito hace algunos años, vive en la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad es de clima frió, gracias a su geografía accidentada tiene grandes paisajes para disfrutar de la naturaleza, su centro se mezcla entre lo colonial y lo moderno, su cultura y tradiciones aun es conservada por sus habitantes.

La Señora. Rosa tiene 40 añosa, es casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 4 hijos de 23, 17, 16 y 10 años de edad, su primer hijo es casado y vive independiente, sus dos siguientes hijos estudian en un colegio de la ciudad y su ultima hija estudia en una escuelita. Su esposo es un profesional del volante por lo que labora prestando sus servicios como chofer de un taxi que es propio, no tienen casa propia por lo que viven en casa de un familiar.

Doña Rosa es una mujer muy trabajadora que se dedica a su hogar, a la venta de ropa y  cosméticos de varias marcas y también trabaja como secretaria en un radio taxi donde  labora en horarios rotativos, a estas actividades se dedica porque así aporta a la economía de su hogar y saca adelante a todo su familia.

Su crédito anterior lo invirtió en la compra de cosméticos y ropa para ofrecer a su selecta clientela y en la cancelación de dicho crédito no tuvo ningún problema por lo que realizo los pagos en las fechas correspondientes. Su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de cosméticos para continuar con su negocio. La banca comunal le gusta por el compañerismo que existe en todo el grupo.
texts.en:
Rosa has been a member of the “El Crédito” communal bank for several years.  She lives in the city of Cuenca, a city with a cold climate.  Thanks to its fractured topography it has great places where nature’s scenery can be enjoyed.  Its city center blends the modern with the colonial and its residents still retain its culture and traditions.

Rosa is 40-years-old, married and has four children who are 23, 17, 16 and 10 years of age.  Her oldest son is married and lives independently; her next two attend a local high-school and her youngest daughter goes to a little elementary school.  Her husband is a professional driver and works providing taxi services in a taxi he owns.  They do not own a house; they live in a relative’s house.

Rosa is a very hardworking woman who is devoted to her home, to selling clothes and cosmetics of several brands and she also works as a secretary for a radio-dispatched taxi firm; she works rotating shifts.  She works at these activities because she’s able to contribute to her home’s economy this way and help support her entire family.

She used her previous loan to buy cosmetics and clothes to offer her select clientele and had no problem repaying it; she did so on the scheduled dates.  She will use her new loan to buy cosmetics to continue with her business.  She likes the communal bank because of the fellowship that exists in the entire group.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics.

loans.name: Francisca

texts.en:
Francisca is is a responsible mother who supports her husband in generating income for their family. She is 38 years old, married and has three school-age children. Despite the hardship of living, she has the determination to improve their living condition to give their children a bright future. She operates their motorcycle transport to generate income while husband operates their farm land. 

She aims to increase her income to satisfy their daily needs and support the education of her children. Due to insufficient capital, she is asking for an additional loan of PHP 10,000 to buy gasoline and spare parts needed for the maintenance of her motorcycle transport. She believes that her patience and hard work will make it possible for her to achieve her dreams in the future.

loans.use: to buy gasoline and spare parts needed for the maintenance of her motorcycle transport.

loans.name: Mary Grace

texts.en:
Mary Grace is 30 years old, married and has two school-age children. She owns and manages a small variety store in their village to supplement her husband's income. They aim to become successful and financially stable someday so as to give their children a better life. She has been operating her business for almost three years and usually earns a profit of PHP 7,000 a month that she usually spends for their daily consumption and the allowances of her children in school. 

Due to high cost of school fees, she aims to increase her income to continuously support the education of her children. To improve the business, she is asking for an additional capital of PHP 10,000 to buy junk foods, candies, canned goods, noodles, beverages, eggs, seasonings and soft drinks to sell. Despite problems and difficulties in life, they have the determination to uplift their status of living in the future.

loans.use: to buy junk foods, candies, canned goods, noodles, beverages, eggs, seasonings and soft drinks for sale.

loans.name: Ana Daisy

texts.es: Ana Daisy de cuarenta y siete años de edad vive junto a sus dos hijas en casa propia. Ella se dedica a la venta de tortillas, el producto es de primera calidad, a precios accesibles y además con un excelente servicio es muy conocida en la zona donde reside, tiene mucha experiencia en las ventas y se ha hecho de mucha clientela que le permite estar adelante de la competencia y obtener las  mejores ganancias; Ana es una mujer que ama su labor, trabaja desde muy temprano para al final del día poder compartir con lo mas importante para ella su familia, es emprendedora, enérgica y con muchas ganas de salir adelante, quiere alcanzar el éxito y no descansará hasta lograrlo. En las ultimas semanas aumento la demanda de su producto y necesita aumentar la inversión por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar maíz por mayor, gas propano, etc. Ana Daisy tiene buenas referencias de pago por parte de sus conocidos, se siente satisfecha con la colaboración, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda en el periodo establecido y al mismo tiempo tiene fe que podrá llevar a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en:
Ana Deisy, 47, lives with her two daughters in her own house.  She makes a living selling tortillas.  Her product is top quality and affordable, and her service is excellent.

She's well known in the area where she lives.  She has a lot of experience in sales and has acquired a lot of customers, which allows her to stay ahead of the competition and get the best profits.

Ana's a woman who loves her job.  She works from an early hour so at the end of the day she can share the most important thing with her family.  She's enterprising and energetic, and has a great desire to get ahead.  She wants to be successful and won't rest until she is.

Demand for her product has increased in the last few weeks and she needs to increase her investment, so she's asking Integral for a loan to buy corn wholesale, propane gas, etc.

Ana Deisy has a good payment record among her acquaintances.  She's satisfied with the cooperation and is certain she'll be able to repay the loan on time.  She also trusts that she'll be able to bring financial security to her household.

loans.use: to buy corn wholesale and propane gas

loans.name: Marta

texts.es: Marta trabaja como costurera desde hace 12 años, un negocio el cual le ha permitido contar con todo lo necesario para salir adelante. Ella vive junto a su único hijo de 14 años de edad quien es el motor que le impulsa a trabajar más duro para darle lo mejor. Marta elabora vestidos, faldas, blusas y otras prendas de vestir las cuales posteriormente comercializa en su casa de habitación y también de forma ambulante. Marta solicita un préstamo con el cual pueda comprar una maquina para coser nueva y más moderna con la cual pueda elaborar ropa más rápido, así mismo para comprar hilos, telas, botones y otros materiales más, con lo que pueda contar con todo lo necesario para mejorar su negocio.
texts.en: Marta has been working as a seamstress for 12 years, a business that’s made it possible for her to have everything needed to get ahead.  She lives with her only son who is 14-years-old and the motor that pushes her to work even harder to provide the best for him.  Marta makes dresses, skirts, blouses and other articles of clothing that she then sells at home and also from place to place.  Marta is asking for a loan to buy a newer, more modern sewing machine to make clothes faster as well as to buy thread, fabric, buttons and other supplies so she can have everything necessary to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy sewing supplies.

loans.name: Marilyn

texts.en:
Due to financial difficulties, Marilyn aims to improve her small variety store to generate sufficient income for her family. She is 40 years old, married and was blessed with three children. She dreams of becoming financially stable in order to educate her children and give them a better future. With the support of her husband, she believes that they will achieve their goals in the future. 

She plans to increase her product offerings to satisfy her customers demand and to increase her income. Due to insufficient capital, she is asking for an additional loan of PHP 10,000 to buy additional stocks of canned goods, junk foods, candies, beverages, detergent soaps, soft drinks and vegetables to sell. She hopes that someday, she will improve the business and make it viable in the future.

loans.use: to buy additional stocks of canned goods, junk foods, candies, beverages, detergent soaps, soft drinks and vegetables to sell.

loans.name: Zosima

texts.en:
Zosima believes that, "a hard working person will become successful in the future." She is 44 years old, married and has two school-age children. They live happily in a rural community planting and harvesting corn and vegetables for sale. Due to the high cost of commodities and school fees, Zosima put-up a small variety store in their village to generate additional income. She aimed to improve and strengthen the business to generate sufficient income from it. 

She is asking for an additional capital of PHP 10,000 to buy additional stocks of grocery items, rice, soft drinks and vegetables to sell. She is hoping that this financial assistance will enable her to improve the business in the future.

loans.use: to buy additional stocks of grocery items, rice, soft drinks and vegetables to sell.

loans.name: Myleen

texts.en: Myleen is a responsible housewife who helps her husband gain income for the sake of their family. She is 30 years old and has two infant-age children. She engages herself in buying and selling various items in the public market. She has been in the business for more than one year and usually earns a profit of 8,000 PHP a month, which she usually spends on her family's daily consumption; she also saves some for their future. She aims to improve the business and make it a viable source of income. Due to insufficient capital, she is asking for an additional of 15,000 PHP to buy additional stocks of T-shirts, underwear, school supplies, accessories, blouses and sandals to sell. She believes that she can improve the business someday as she continues to work hard and strive harder.

loans.use: to buy additional stocks of T-shirts, underwear, school supplies, accessories, blouses and sandals to sell.

loans.name: Jose Antonio

texts.es: José Antonio de cincuenta y siete años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y su nieta; el posee una tienda donde vende productos de primera necesidad granos básicos, leche, huevos, jabón etc., ya tiene varios años con el negocio y le ha dado resultado, le deja muy buenas ganancias, sus clientes lo prefieren porque siempre tiene lo que necesita con producto de excelente calidad y a precios bajos además se caracteriza por ser muy amable con todos; José es un hombre emprendedor dispuesto a trabajar duro para lograr sus sueños;  quiere invertir más en el negocio porque ya no le alcanzan los productos, pero necesita un apoyo económico por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita granos básicos, producto instantáneo, golosinas, bebidas etc. José Antonio tiene buenas referencias de pago, esta muy contento con el apoyo, es muy responsable por eso asegura que podrá saldar la deuda en el tiempo establecido y al mismo tiempo le dará a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en:
José Antonio is 56 years old and lives together with his life partner and his granddaughter. He owns a shop where he sells basic products, milk, eggs, soap, etc. He has been working in this business for many years now and he has been very successful because his customers know he will give them quality products at competitive prices. Additionally, he his very kind with everyone he meets. 

José is an enterprising man who is very willing to work hard to realize his dreams. He would like to invest more in stocking his shop because he needs more products to offer his customers. However, for this he requires some financial support. That is why he is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL. This loan will help him to buy some basic food items, food mixes, candy, soft drinks, etc. for his store. 

José has a great record of repayment. He is very happy to have this support to help him give his family a full life, and he pledges to make all of his repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy basic food items, food mixes, candy, soft drinks, etc.

loans.name: Mary Jane

texts.en:
Mary Jane is 28 years old, married and has three infant-age children. She aims to improve her variety store to help her husband in generating income. They both aim to earn and save more income to satisfy their necessities and save for the future of their children. Despite problems and difficulties they have encountered in life, Mary Jane has the determination to continue to improve the business in order to uplift their living standards.

To accomplish this, Mary Jane is asking for a loan of P20,000.00 to buy sugar, flour, canned goods, soft drinks, snack foods and beverages to resell. This financial assistance will be of great help in her efforts to improve the business and someday become financially stable.

loans.use: to buy sugar, flour, canned goods, soft drinks, snack foods and beverages to resell.

loans.name: Vincy

texts.en:
Vincy is now 57 years old, married and has four grown-up children. She is a hard-working mother who aims to uplift their living conditions in order to give her children a bright future. She owns and offers board lodgings to the students who are away from their home. This is her way of generating additional income for their family. 

She aims to improve and expand the boarding house to provide more bed spaces for rent but due to insufficient capital, she is asking for an additional sum of PHP 10,000 to buy the materials needed to improve the boarding house. She believes that this loan will make it possible to improve the boarding house to provide a better service to her boarders.

loans.use: to buy the materials needed for the improvement of the boarding house where she has rooms for rent.

loans.name: Gjon

texts.en:
Gjon, is a 54-year-old villager and a father of three school-aged children. Two of them are at universities and one attends high-school. He lives in the northwest of Albania. He and his wife have been taking care of his mother-in-law because the father–in-law passed away after being brutally tortured in prison, during the communist era. 

For the past twelve years, Gjon has been breeding milk cows and has been selling dairy products at the local market of a little town. Being the only one to provide financially for his family of six people hasn’t been easy at all, Gjon said.

He is now requesting a loan of 50,000 Albanian Lek to repair the existing cows’ stable and as soon as he receives it, he will start working on it immediately.

loans.use: To repair a damaged stable.

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
Josephine, a 43-year-old hardworking mother of three school-age children, sells grocery items, fruits and vegetables in the public market. Her goal is to improve the business to generate sufficient income in order to satisfy their necessities and support the education of their children. Josephine and her husband want them to earn a degree so that they will find a good job someday. Despite the hardships of living, she has the strong determination to improve the business.

Josephine is requesting a loan of P50,000.00 to buy additional stocks of grocery items, fruits and vegetables to resell. She strongly believes that this loan will be a great help in improving her business and achieving her goals in life.

loans.use: to buy additional stocks of grocery items, fruits and vegetables to resell.

loans.name: Evelynda

texts.en:
Evelynda is married to a tricycle driver. The couple is blessed with four children, three of whom are studying while the youngest child is still an infant.

For the past three years, Evelynda has operated her food stall "talipapa", offering different kinds of vegetables, meat, fish and other ingredients. Her desire in life is to increase her income. For now, she manages her time wisely in order to get ahead in life and to satisfy her customer demand. Even though she has an infant, Evelynda is still able to manage her business well.

Evelynda is requesting a loan of PHP 6,000 to buy different kinds of vegetables, chicken, fish and other ingredients needed for basic commodities. She hopes to get this loan in order to obtain her goals in life.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, chicken, fish and other ingredients needed in her food stall

loans.name: Elvie

texts.en:
Elvie belongs to a poor family. Her aim in life is to finish her studies, but due to her family situation, she didn't able to achieved that. She worked now as a babysitter to help her parents in providing their daily basic needs. Eventually Elvie married, and now has two children.

Elvie and her husband decided to open a mini restaurant, and they continue to work to make it more profitable. Now that the restaurant is growing, she needs to adopt another marketing strategy in order to encourage more customers and provide quality service. In order to augment their income, Elvie began to do a direct-selling business. She sells cosmetics and apparel products from a Personal Collection Company.

Elvie is now requesting a loan of PHP 10,000 to buy stocks of cosmetics, foods, and beverages to sell. She knows that this loan could further improve her business.

loans.use: to buy stocks of cosmetics, foods and beverages to sell

loans.name: Shirley

texts.en:
Shirley is a responsible mother who aims to become financially stable in order support her husband in satisfying their family's needs and supporting the education of their children. Likewise, Shirley aims to improve her business to generate sufficient income for her family. She is 53 years old and has three children. She has owned and managed a variety store near the school campus for almost four years and usually earns a profit of PHP 10,000 a month that she usually spends on their daily consumption and the allowances of her children in school. 

She aims to increase her product offerings to satisfy her customers' demand but due to insufficient capital, she is asking for an additional sum of PHP 25,000 to buy junk foods, candies, biscuits, soft drinks, breads and raw ingredients to be cooked and sold on the school campus. She is hoping that she will be able to improve the business through this financial assistance.

loans.use: to buy junk foods, candies, biscuits, soft drinks, breads and raw ingredients to be cooked and sold on the school campus.

loans.name: Jennyvi

texts.en:
Jennyvi is a college graduate who is married and has one child. Her spouse is a supervisor at Harvard Jeans in Manila.The couple desires to improve their financial stability and have a better way of living.

For the past three years, Jennyvi has operated a food production business. She also has a direct sales business, in particular Personal Collection and Fuller Life. Jennyvi's food production business is better and more marketable than her direct sales business. With her determination to succeed, Jennyvi is asking for a loan of PHP 15,000 to buy kilograms of frozen foods such as sausage (longanisa), hot dogs, tocino (sweetened cured pork) and embutido (meat loaf).  She hopes and prays that she can obtain her goal and be able to access continuous financial services from lenders.

loans.use: to buy kilograms of frozen foods (meats) for her food production sales

loans.name: Ermelinda

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 3 filhos, 2 a frequentar Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém.

É comerciante e dona do negocio de venda de produtos alimentares diversos. Com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (refrescos, bolachas, massas, sumos e outros) para aumentar a quantidade do seu produto e satisfazer a demanda da sua clientela.

No futuro pretende fazer crescer o seu negocio e regressar a Escola para aumentar o seu nível, assim compromete-se a pagar devidamente este empréstimo para poder aceder a mais créditos na Hluvuku.

O desafio é conseguir um tempo de voltar a Escola e continuar a fazer crescer o seu negócio.
texts.en: Ermelinda is married and is the mother of three children, two of whom go to school.  She lives in her own house with her family and doesn't support anyone else besides them.  She owns her own business selling various food products.  She will use this loan to buy products (soft drinks, crackers, pasta, juice, etc.) to increase her amount of merchandise to satisfy her customers' demand.  In the future, she hopes to grow her business and to go back to school to raise her level of education.  To do this, she promises to make her payments on time so she can apply for more loans from Hluvuku.  Her challenge is finding time to go back to school and to continue making her business grow.

loans.use: to buy products (soft drinks, crackers, pasta, juice, etc.).

loans.name: Ana

texts.pt:
Separada e mãe de 4 filhos, outros ja maior de idade 1 a frequentar Escola, vive na casa própria com os seus filhos e não sustenta mais ninguém.

É comerciante e dona do negocio de venda de produtos diversos. Com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (areia, cimento, pedra e outros) para rebocar o murro da sua casa.

No futuro pretende adquirir uma viatura para auxiliar no seu negocio, assim compromete-se a pagar devidamente este empréstimo para poder aceder a mais créditos na Hluvuku.

O desafio é trabalhar mais assegurar que seu negócio consiga lhe render de forma a juntar fundos para o seu objectivo.
texts.en: Ana is separated and the mother of four children.  Three are adults and one is in school.  She lives in her own home with her children and doesn't support anyone besides them.  She owns a business selling various products.  She will use this loan to buy construction materials (sand, cement, stone, etc.) to plaster the wall outside of her house.  In the future, she wants to acquire a vehicle help her business.  To do this, she promises to make her payments on time so she can apply for more loans from Hluvuku in the future.  Her challenge is working more to ensure that her business makes the necessary income to reach her goals.

loans.use: to buy construction matierals (sand, cement, stone, etc.).

loans.name: Elsie Lily

texts.en:
Elsie Lily is married and has three children. In the absence of her spouse, she both stands as father and mother to her children. Elsie Lily has owned and operated her retail store for two years. According to her, she earns about PHP 1,500 daily. She uses her profits to pay their monthly electric bill, the allowance of her youngest child and some of the amount serves as her savings.

Elsie Lily would like to ask for a loan of PHP 8,000 which will allow her to buy groceries such as soft drinks, basic necessities and assorted biscuits for her retail store. Through this loan, she will be able to make an additional saving of her fare to and from the market. In addition, she will be able to meet the needs of her customers.

loans.use: to buy groceries such as soft drinks, basic necessities and assorted biscuits for her retail store.

loans.name: Laura

texts.pt:
Casada e mãe de 4 filhos, outros já maior de idade, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta sua mãe e irmãos enviando algum valor para despesas de casa.

É comerciante tem um salão de cabeleireiro e com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar secadores e produtos para o salão e responder com os melhores serviços a sua clientela..

No futuro pretende adquirir uma viatura para auxiliar no seu negocio, assim compromete-se a pagar devidamente este empréstimo para poder aceder a mais créditos na Hluvuku.

O desafio é adquirir todo o material necessário para poder exercer a sua actividade conforme o seu plano.
texts.en:
Laura is married and the mother of 4 children, some of whom are already of age. She lives in her own house with her family and supports her mother and brothers by sending them some money for household expenses.

She is a businesswoman and has a hairdressing salon. With this loan she plans to buy hair dryers and products for her salon so she can provide the best services for her clients.

In future, Laura intends to purchase a vehicle to help with her business. To this end, she commits to duly paying off the loan in order to solicit further loans from Hluvuku.

Her challenge is to acquire all the necessary materials to carry out her activities according to plan.

loans.use: buy hair dryers and products for her salon

loans.name: Tito

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 5 filhos, outros ainda frequentam escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém.

Trabalha como segurança numa empresa privada e com o presente empréstimo C para dar continuidade com a construção da sua casa.

No futuro gostaria de terminar a sua obra e tirar carta de condução de veículos, assim compromete-se a pagar devidamente este empréstimo para poder aceder a mais créditos na Hluvuku.

O desafio é conseguir gerir o pouco fundo para poder pagar a escola de condução.
texts.en:
Tito is married and the father of 5 children, some of whom still attend School. He lives in his own house with his family and doesn't support anyone else.

He works as a security guard for a private company and plans to use the current loan to continue the construction of his home.

In future Tito would like to complete the building work and get his driver's license. To this end, he commits to duly paying off his loan so he can request further loans from Hluvuku.

His challenge is to manage the little funds he has to pay for driving lessons.

loans.use: continue the construction of his home

loans.name: Antonio

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 3 filhos, 2 dos quais frequentam Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta 2 irmãs enviando algum valor para ajudar nas despesas correntes.

É pedreiro de profissão e tem um negocio de venda de produtos alimentares administrado pela esposa. Com  o presente empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (amendoim, frangos congelados, peixe, óleo, farinha, arroz e outros) para diversificar e aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria.

No futuro pretende apostar ainda mais no negocio para poder obter mais rendimento, assim compromete-se a pagar devidamente este empréstimo para poder aceder a mais créditos na Hluvuku.

O desafio é conseguir investir suficientemente no seu negocio.
texts.en:
Antonio is married with three children, two of whom are attending school. He lives in his own house with his family and supports two of his sisters, sending them money to help with their expenses.

He is a mason and also has a business selling food products, which his wife manages. He will use this loan to buy products such as peanuts, frozen chicken, fish, oil, flour, and rice, among others. This will allow him to diversify and expand the quantity of his merchandise.

In the future, he hopes to continue developing his business to obtain more income. Therefore, he is committed to dutifully paying off this loan in order to continue working with Hluvuku.

His challenge is to sufficiently invest in his business.

loans.use: to buy products such as peanuts, frozen chicken, fish, oil, flour, and rice.

loans.name: Angelica

texts.pt:
Casada e mãe de 2 filhos, todos ainda menores de idade para frequentar Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta sua prima que vive com eles.

É comerciante e dona do negocio de venda de produtos diversos.Com  o presente empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (barrotes, chapas de zinco, pregos, arame, cimento e outros) para fazer a cobertura da outra parte da sua casa que ainda estava em falta.

No futuro deseja conseguir mais financiamentos para poder melhorar as condições de habitação,  para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente este empréstimo para poder aceder a mais créditos na Hluvuku.

O desafio é concluir a sua casa e conseguir investir suficientemente no seu negocio.
texts.en:
Angelica is married and the mother of 2 children who are both too young to go to School. She lives in her own house with her family and supports a cousin who lives with them.

She's a trader and owns her own business selling various products. With the current loan she intends to buy construction materials (beams, zinc plates, screws, wire, cement and others) to cover the portion of her house that is missing a ceiling.

In future she hopes to obtain more financing so she can improve her living conditions. To this end, she commits to duly paying off the loan in order to solicit further loans from Hluvuku.

Her challenge is to finish her house and be able to invest sufficient funds into her business.

loans.use: buy construction materials (beams, zinc plates, screws, wire, cement and others) to cover the portion of her house that is missing a ceiling.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy chicks, ration, vitamin and other products

loans.name: Rosita

texts.pt:
Casada e mãe de 4 filhos que ainda frequentam Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta mais ninguém.

É agricultora e possui uma are apropria onde desenvolve a sua actividade agrícola. Com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar insumos agrícolas (cenoura, couve, cebola, regador e outros) para aumentar a sua produção. 

No futuro deseja aumentar ainda mais as suas áreas de produção para melhorar o seu rendimento, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente este empréstimo para poder aceder a mais na Hluvuku.

O desafio é conseguir produzir outras culturas no tempo chuvoso.
texts.en:
Rosita is married and the mother of 4 children who still attend School. She lives in her own house with her family and doesn't support anyone else.

She's a farmer and owns some land where she carries out her farming activities. With this loan she plans to buy farming raw materials (carrots, cabbages, onions, watering can and others) to increase her production.

In future she hopes to increase her production area even more to improve her income. To this end, she commits to duly paying off the loan in order to solicit further loans from Hluvuku.

Her challenge is to manage to cultivate other items in the rainy season.
