This is her only source of income and Kamolot is trying to expand her business.  On receiving her loan, she would like to buy some cattle and increase the size of her herd.  Kamolot is thankful for organizations like Arvand because with their help, people who need financial support can implement their plans.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Noemi

texts.en:
Noemi has a business selling surplus spare parts for vehicles. Her partner in managing the business is her husband. They have managed the business for eight years, and still hope to develop their business further. Noemi started the business by buying and selling in different villages. Once they had enough earnings, they decided to put up a stall in front of their house.

Noemi has not stopped dreaming. At present, her dreams include having their own car, a better house for more comfortable living, and sending their four children to school to finish their education. 

Noemi wants to sell rare spare parts that they seldom have to sell. Therefore, she is asking for a loan of 30,000 PHP to buy spare parts to sell. She and her husband will work hard to bring her dreams to fruition.

loans.use: to buy spare parts to sell

loans.name: Mubin

texts.ru: Мубин  молодой энергичный мужчина по специальности преподаватель, обучает детей  в сельской школе и заодно занимается торговлей, так как на одну зарплату невозможно содержать семью и накопить денег для крупных расходов. Он решил получить кредит для покупки бытовой техники, так как недавно стали отдельно жить от родителей.   Мубин хочет обставить свой дом и приобрести необходимые вещи для хозяйства,но все сразу невозможно приобрести поэтому он   решил взять   кредит.  На полученный кредит хочет купить  холодильник. Заранее благодарит за финансовую поддержку.
texts.en: Mubin is a young, energetic man who works as a teacher.  He teaches children in the village school and at the same time he works as a shopkeeper, since it is impossible for him to support his family on just one salary and to save money for big expenses.  Mubin has decided to apply for a loan to buy some home appliances, since he and his family recently moved out of his parents' house.  He wants to furnish his home and buy the necessary things for his household, but this is not possible all at once, which is why he decided to ask for a loan.  On receiving the loan, he would like to buy a refrigerator.  He gives thanks in advance for the financial support.

loans.use: to buy a refrigerator

loans.name: Shehnaz's Group

texts.en:
Shehnaz is a 50-year-old married woman and a mother of four children -- two sons and two daughters. Her husband is a government employee. Both daughters are married, an elder son is a government employee, and the younger one is a taxi driver.

Since 2004 Shahnaz has been in the business of selling milk, which comes from her three buffaloes. She provides a valuable service in her community by selling milk to many of her neighbors. Her sons help her with her business, as does her husband.

As the winter season has started she wants to construct a small dairy farm consisting of two rooms outside of her house to protect the animals from the severe cold. However, due to the lack of finances she is unable to do this.

As a member of four-person lending group she has requested a loan from Kiva's partner BRAC Pakistan.

She hopes to get more profit from her small dairy business and desires to buy one cow from the profit amount in the future.

She is very much thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

Note: In the picture Shahnaz holds a passbook in her hand.

loans.use: to construct a small dairy farm for her milk-selling business.

loans.name: Santos

texts.es: Santos de cuarenta años de edad vive junto a  sus hijos en casa propia, ella posee una tienda, vende arroz, pan, producto instantáneo, jabón, entre otros además comercializa paletas y productos helados desde su negocio o de forma ambulante, tiene varios años con el negocio y eso le ha regalado experiencia valiosa en las ventas que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, es muy conocida, tiene mucha clientela pues las personas la prefieren porque todo lo que comercia es de primera calidad y a precios accesibles además  del servicio inigualable siempre a la orden de los clientes; Santos es una mujer enérgica, trabajadora, y con muchas metas por delante, esta dispuesta a esforzarse al máximo pues sabe que solo así podrá cumplir sus sueños y llegar al éxito, como toda buena comerciante quiere acrecentar el negocio y realizar nuevas inversiones pero no posee de suficiente capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar, pan, paletas, hielo, golosinas, producto instantáneo, bebidas, jabones, etc. Santos tiene buenas referencias de pago, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez tiene fe que podrá llevar a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en:
Santos is 40 years old and lives with her children in her own home. She has a store where she sells rice, bread, instant products, and soap. Santos also sells popsicles and ice cream products from her business and as a street vendor. She has managed her business for several years and has gained valuable sales experience, which has allowed her to generate more income. Santos is well-known and has many customers who prefer to do business with her because everything she sells is of first-rate quality and offered at affordable prices. In addition, her service is unequaled since she always considers her customers her first priority.

Santos is an energetic and hardworking woman who has many goals that she would like to accomplish. She is willing to do her best because she knows that is the only way for her to fulfill her dreams and become successful. Like any good merchant, Santos wants to grow her business and make new investments. However, she does not have sufficient capital, so she is requesting a loan from Apoyo Integral. The money will enable her to buy bread, popsicles, ice, snack foods, instant products, beverages, soaps, and other items.

Santos has good credit references and is confident that she will repay this debt. At the same time, she has faith that she will be able to provide financial stability for her household.

loans.use: to buy bread, popsicles, ice, snack foods, instant products, beverages, soaps, and other items.

loans.name: Rosa Lidia

texts.es: Rosa Lidia vive junto a su hijo y nietos, ella posee una tienda donde vende artículos de primera necesidad frijoles, arroz, pan, leche, huevos, azúcar, jabones entre otros, tiene varios años con el negocio y eso le ha regalado mucha experiencia en las ventas que le  permite obtener siempre las mejores ganancias, es muy conocida en la localidad la gente la recomienda porque su tienda es muy surtida siempre tiene lo que la gente necesita a precios accesibles, con producto de calidad y un servicio excelente; Rosa  es una mujer dedicada a su labor, enérgica, y muy motivada a salir adelante, le gusta luchar por sus sueños sabe que si se esfuerza al máximo lograra lo que se propone y tendrá mucho éxito en su vida. Como toda buena comerciante quiere acrecentar el negocio y realizar una nueva inversión por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar granos básicos, golosinas, pan, producto instantáneo, bebidas, jabones, etc. Rosa Lidia tiene buenas referencias de pago y una moral intachable esta satisfecha con el apoyo, tiene la certeza que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez confía en que llevara a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en:
Rosa Lidia lives with her son and grandchildren. She has a store where she sells basic necessities such as beans, rice, bread, milk, eggs, sugar, soap, and other products. Rosa has been in business for several years and has gained a great deal of sales experience, which has allowed her to generate more income. She is well-known in her town since people recommend her store because it is always stocked. Her customers are always looking for affordable prices, quality products, and excellent service.

Rosa is a woman who is dedicated to her work, energetic, and motivated to succeed. She enjoys the process of chasing her dreams, so she strives to do her best to attain them. As a result, she has had much success in life. Like any good merchant, she wants to grow her business so she will make a new investment with the loan she requested from Apoyo Integral. This loan will enable her to buy basic grains, snack foods, bread, instant products, beverages, soap, and other items.

Rosa Lidia has good credit references and moral character beyond reproach. She is pleased to have this support and is certain that she will be able to repay this debt. Rosa is also confident that she can provide financial security for her household.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, snack foods, bread, instant products, beverages, soap, and other items.

loans.name: Dile

texts.en:
Dile is in her fifties and married. She and her family live in northern Albania, in a little town of approximately 10,000 people. Prior to residing in this town, they lived almost all of their lives in another region where she was employed as a pharmacist. She has always been the only financial provider for her family. With her income, she even paid her children's university tuition fees.

About three years ago, Dile opened her own drugstore, and she has established a steady clientele. She says she is very proud of her business.

Dile is requesting a loan of 150,000 ALL to purchase pharmaceuticals and other items for her store's inventory. This will be her second loan; the previous loan has been paid in full.

loans.use: to purchase pharmaceuticals and other items for her drugstore

loans.name: Gjeline

texts.en:
Gjeline, a villager in her fifties, has four children, with one of them still attending school. She and her family have been persecuted during the communist era, the leadership of Enver Hoxha and she and others including her family had hard lives, Gjeline said. 

This will be her first loan and she is requesting it to buy a milk cow because a couple months back the one she had unfortunately died. She lives in a rural village, very high in the northern mountains. 

Her main activity for all these twenty years has been in agriculture/livestock and she’s been selling veggies, grains and also dairy products to the locals.

loans.use: To purchase a milk cow

loans.name: Gladys Monserrate

texts.es: Gladys tiene 58 años de edad de estado civil es divorciada y tiene 2 hijos que son mayores de edad por lo que ya  son independientes. Ella comenzó su taller de costura hace muchos años atrás cuando se compra una máquina de coser y puso un letrero fuera de su casa diciendo se confecciona ropa y tuvo mucha acogida entre vecinos y amigos por lo pronto, Gladys tuvo un capital y compro mas máquina de coser. En la actualidad trabajan con 2 ayudantes de lunes a sábados desde las 8 de la mañana hasta las 6 de la tarde. Con el crédito comprara otra máquina de coser, hilos, cierres etc. Su meta e poder enseñarles este oficio a muchas personas y así poder brindar trabajo a mucha gente que lo necesite.
texts.en:
Gladys is 58 years old, divorced, and has two grown and independent children. She began her sewing business many years ago when she bought a sewing machine and put a sign outside of her house saying she made clothes. Soon after she had a lot of business from neighbors and friends, and had enough money to buy another sewing machine. She currently works with two assistants, Mondays through Saturdays, from 8 in the morning until 6 in the evening. 

With this loan, she will buy another sewing machine, thread, and other sewing materials. Her goal is to be able to teach many people how to sew, in order to provide work for people who need it.

loans.use: To buy a sewing machine, thread, and other sewing materials

loans.name: Shirley Martiza

texts.es: Shirley  tiene 46 años de edad está soltera, y no tiene hijos.  Shirley a falta de que no conseguía un trabajo estable hace 10 años. Tomo la decisión  de ponerse un negocio propio  ya que Shirley tiene habilidades para cocinar  abrió  un comedor  en su casa pues ahí vende comida. Ella trabaja de lunes a viernes desde las 6:00am hasta 21:00pm. Con el préstamo Shirley   quiere comprar arroz, aceite y también  arreglar el local etc. Su meta a futuro es comprarse una camioneta para poder realizar su entrega de comida  a lugares lejanos, y  también que su comedor se convierta en un restaurante muy reconocido por vender comidas típicas del Ecuador.
texts.en:
Shirley is 46 years old, single, and does not have any children. 10 years ago, when she was having difficulties finding a stable job, Shirley made the decision to start her own business. As she is a very good cook, she opened an eatery in her home from which she sells food. She works from Monday through Friday, from 6am to 9pm. 

With this loan, Shirley will buy rice and oil and will also fix up the eating area. Her future goal is to buy a truck that she can use to deliver her food to further away places, and she also wants her dining area to become a full restaurant that is recognized for selling typical Ecuadorian foods.

loans.use: to buy rice and oil and to fix up her shop

loans.name: Irene

texts.es:
La socia Irene tiene 42 años de edad,es casada y tiene 2 hijos,la socia se dedica al negocio de picanteria,la socia vende cerveza,gaseosas y chicha que es una bebida a base de maiz,la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene 20 años de edad,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de picanteria.La socia solicita el credito para comprar sillas y mesas para implementar la picanteria.

La socia esta feliz con le credito y se compromete a pagar las cuotas.
texts.en:
Irene is 42 years old, married, and has two children.  She works at her restaurant.  She sells beer, sodas, and chicha, which is a drink made from corn.  She works from 8:00am until 5:00pm and has twenty years of experience.  Her dream is to expand the carpentry business.  She is requesting this loan to purchase chairs and tables to start her restaurant.  

She is happy with the loan and promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to purchase tables and chairs to start a restaurant.

loans.name: Ramona Guadalupe

texts.es: Ramona vive en un sector periurbano  de la ciudad de Guayaquil llamado Guasmo, tiene 57 años de edad   es soltera y tiene hijos mayores de edad por  lo ya que son independientes. Ella a raíz de la separación de su ex pareja toma la decisión de buscar trabajo y como nadie le dada la oportunidad de trabajar en una empresa, junto dinero que tenia y dio apertura a su negocio propio que es una tienda de víveres en general. En la actualidad trabaja en su tienda de víveres todos los días desde las 8 de la mañana hasta las 10 de la noche. Con el préstamo comprara  arroz, azúcar harina, vitrinas  y arreglara su local, etc. Su meta es tener un mini market  reconocido en la ciudad para satisfacer las necesidades de los consumidores.
texts.en:
Ramona lives in the semi-urban area around the city of Guyaquil called Guasmo. She is 57 years old, single, and has two grown, independent children. As a result of her separation from her ex-husband, Ramona decided to look for a job, but since nobody would give her the opportunity to work for a business she gathered all of the money she had and opened her own general store. She currently works in the store every day from 8 in the morning until 10 at night. 

With this loan, she will buy rice, sugar, flour, display cases, and other items to fix up the shop. Her goal is to have a mini-market that is recognized in the city for serving all of its customers' needs.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, flour, display cases, and other items to fix up her shop

loans.name: Pedro Esequiel

texts.es: Pedro tiene 37 años de edad es soltero, tiene 1 hijo de 5 años. Su padre tenía un  taller mecánico, Gracias a su padre Pedro aprendió lo que se trata la mecánica. A raíz del fallecimiento de su padre el tomo el mando totalmente del taller mecánico. En la actualidad el trabaja de lunes a viernes desde las 8 de la mañana hasta las 7 de la noche. Con el préstamo quiere comprar pintura, herramientas etc.
texts.en: Pedro is 37 years old, single, and has a five year old son. His father established a mechanic shop many years ago, and thanks to his father he learned a lot about how to be a mechanic. When his father passed away he took over the shop, and currently works there every Monday through Friday, from 8 in the morning until 7 in the evening. With this loan, he will buy paint and other tools that he needs to supply the shop.

loans.use: to buy paint and tools

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy blocks, cement, iron, and sand, and to pay for construction costs

loans.name: Fátima Del Socorro

texts.es: Fátima de 32 años, su compañero de vida trabaja en una zona franca como operador de maquinas y apoya en los gastos familiares, tiene 2 hijos menores de 9 años, con mucho esfuerzo ha mantenido los gastos del hogar y los estudios de sus hijos, ella ha trabajado en la zona franca pero su hijo menor se le enfermo puesto a que tuvo que renunciar, ahora trabaja como empleada domestica en una casa particular, sus créditos los ha utilizado para la mejora de su vivienda este préstamo lo solicita para acondicionar sus cuartos por lo que necesita comprar cemento, arena, bloques, hierro, zinc, piedrín, para empezar la obra lo más pronto ya que una parte de las paredes todavía son de laminas de zinc y a veces es muy caliente y ella desea hacer la pared de concreto.
texts.en: Fátima is 32 years old and her partner works as a machine operator in order to cover the family's expenses. They have two children under the age of 9, and with a lot of hard work and effort have been able to maintain the costs of their home and of their children's studies. Fátima used to work in a factory but when her youngest son became sick she had to quit, and she now works as a domestic helper in a large home. She has used previous loans to improve her home, and this loan will also be used to add some rooms to the home. She needs to buy cement, sand, blocks, iron, zinc, and stones in order to do so. She would like to start the work as soon as possible, in order to put in a concrete wall, as one of the walls at the moment is just a sheet of metal and sometimes it gets very hot.

loans.use: To buy cement, sand, blocks, iron, zinc, and stones

loans.name: Harlan Jose

texts.es:
El Señor Harlan Guevara. Habitante de la comunidad Buenos Aires del Municipio de Ticuantepe, Casado, trabajador de una empresa Privada como Auxiliar de Caja, Junto a su esposa han salidos adelante y sobre todo han mantenido a su hijo. su esposa le ayuda con los gastos del hogar ya que ella tiene su propio negocio y con esos ingresar apoya a cubrir ciertos gastos del hogar, el sueño de ambos es tener su casa propia, pero no han podido recaurdar todo el dinero para iniciar a construirla, el tiene parte de los Materiales que necesita pero aun le hacia falta completarlos. con este Credito que Afodenic le ha financiado comprara los siguientes Materiales: Cemento, Hierro, Cuartones, Clavos, Viaje de Arena y Piedrin.
El señor Harlan se encuentra muy agradecido con Afodenic por brindale la confianza y el gran apoyo que le estan dando con este Financiamiento. ya que el espera seguir trabajando con nosotros para cumplir su gran sueño que es tener su casita.
texts.en:
Harlan Guevara, resident of the Buenos Aires community in the municipality of Ticuantepe, is married and works as a cashier for a private company. He and his wife have worked very hard to support themselves and their son, and his wife helps with home expenses as she has her own business with which she can provide for the family. Their dream is to be able to have their own home, but they have not been able to save all of the money they need to begin to construct it. Harlan has some of the necessary materials, but with this loan he will be able to buy the cement, iron, zinc, and sand that he needs for the construction. 

Harlan is very grateful for Afodenic for having confidence in him, and for the great support that he is receiving with this loan. He hopes to continue to work with the microfinance institution in order to reach his dream of having his own home.

loans.use: to buy construction materials including iron, zinc, cement and sand

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy bricks, cement and sand to put a floor in her house

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy shellfish

loans.name: José Isabel

texts.es:
José tiene 30 años de edad, es casado. A los 11 años de edad, inicio trabajando como jornalero en las fincas de café, realizando actividades de podas de café, de limpieza, fertilización y en la corta. A los 20 años de edad emprendió el oficio de la albañilería y se caso. Es una familia con valores y principios, responsable. Él es cliente de recurrente de la Fundación.  

El préstamo que esta solicitando es para comprar madera, 1000 tejas, clavos, 10 pliegos de lámina y el resto para pago de mano de obra para construir una pequeña cocina en su casa. De esta manera, tendrá una casa digna para que su familia se sienta más cómoda. Entre sus objetivos están el instalar una granja de pollos de engorde y gallinas ponedoras, continuar trabajando con la Fundación Campo, para cumplir con los proyectos personales y familiares.
texts.en:
José is 30 years old and is married. When he was 11 years old, he started working as a day laborer on the coffee farms, undertaking the activities of pruning, cleaning, fertilizing and cutting the coffee. At the age of 20, he took up the occupation of masonry and got married. The family has values and principles and is responsible. He is a recurrent client of the Fundación.
The loan that he is requesting is for the purchase of wood, 1000 shingles, nails, 10 corrugated metal sheets and to pay for labor to construct a small kitchen in his home. In this way, he will have a decent house so that his family will feel more comfortable. Among his objectives are establishing a broilers (chickens for meat) and layers (hens for laying eggs) farm and continuing to work with Fundación Campo to achieve his personal and familial projects.

loans.use: to purchase wood, 1000 shingles, nails, 10 corrugated metal sheets and to pay for labor to construct a small kitchen in his home.

loans.name: Marta Mayra

texts.es: La señora Marta de 54 años es soltera sus hijos independientes, ella laboró en zona franca después comenzó hace muchos años a trabajar en el negocio de elaboración de rosquillas y empanaditas, continuo el negocio que le dejo su mama y es lo que le ayuda a sufragar los gastos necesarios, sus créditos los ha invertido en el negocio con materia prima, ahora con este séptimo préstamo desea comprar leche, queso, leña, azúcar, canela, manteca, margarina, así como también espera darle mantenimiento al horno que es su principal fuente de trabajo que se le está deteriorando y es necesario tenerlo en buenas condiciones para seguir elaborando mas rosquillas, aprovechando que tiene muchas energía y ánimos de salir adelante, hasta el momento no ha tenido problemas de salud ni familiar.
texts.en:
Marta, 54, is single with adult children.  She worked in a tax-free area and then began many years ago to work in the business of making "rosquillas" [crunchy ring-shaped cookies] and "empanaditas" [little pies].  She continued with the business that her mother left her, which helps her defray the necessary expenses.

She has invested her loans in raw materials for her business.  Now, with this seventh loan, she wants to buy milk, cheese, firewood, sugar, cinnamon, butter, and margarine.  She also hopes to do maintenance on her oven.  It's her main source of work, but it's deteriorating and she needs to have it in good condition so she can continue making rosquillas, to make the most of her energy and desire to get ahead.

Up to now she has had no health or family problems.

loans.use: to buy supplies to make cookies

loans.name: María Alexandra

texts.es:
En Los Bajos de Montecristi, ciudad conocida por su gran diversidad de productos típicos, como por ejemplo los sombreros de paja toquillas conocidos dentro y fuera del país se reúnen cada 15  días las socias del Banco Comunal 4 De Noviembre.

En este lugar vive la señora María, tiene 42 años de edad, está casada hace 15 años y de esta relación tienen tres hijos de  17, 15 y 13 años que  estudian en colegio. Su esposo se dedica al comercio.

Doña María para poder ayudar a sus esposo con los gastos del hogar ya que con lo que él gana no alcanza para cubrir los gastos, hace varios años empezó un negocio, ella tiene un pequeño comedor en su casa en el cual prepara deliciosos platos, trabaja todos los días desde las seis hasta las tres de la tarde. Tiene su comedor por 15 años y siempre le ha ido muy bien ya que sus clientes la prefieren por la sazón que le pone a sus platos, ella en las mañanas preparar el delicioso ceviche de pescado y de camarón platos muy degustados por sus clientes.

Este crédito es para comprar víveres para la preparación de los alimentos. Está desde el inicio en el Banco Comunal y le gusta por la ayuda que siempre le brindan los créditos.
 
Sus metas son seguir adelante en su negocio y darles una buena educación a sus hijos.
texts.en:
The 4th of November Communal Bank meets every 15 days in Los Bajos de Montecristi, a city known for its great diversity of traditional products, such as straw hats that are known across the country and abroad. 

This is where María lives. She is 42 years old, has been married for 15 years and has three children from her relationship, who are 17, 15 and 13 years old. They are all in high school. Her husband is a merchant.

María started a business many years ago in order to help her husband with their family's expenses, because what he earned was not enough to cover everything. She has a small dining room in her house where she prepares delicious dishes. She works every day from six in the morning until three in the afternoon. She has had her dining room for 15 years and it has always done very well because her customers prefer the flavor of her dishes. In the mornings, María prepares delicious seafood ceviches that her customers love.

This loan is for buying ingredients for preparing her dishes. María has been a member of her communal bank from the start and she likes it because the loans are always very helpful.

María's goals are to continue moving her business forward and to provide her children with a good education.

loans.use: to buy ingredients

loans.name: Manuela Petita

texts.es:
En Los Bajos de Montecristi, ciudad conocida por su gran diversidad de productos típicos, como por ejemplo los sombreros de paja toquillas conocidos dentro y fuera del país se reúnen cada 15  días las socias del Banco Comunal 4 De Noviembre.

En este lugar vive la señora Manuela, tiene 44 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene tres hijos de 18, 13 y 12 años que estudian en el colegio. El marido es controlador de buses.
 
Doña Manuela para ganarse la vida y para ayudar a su esposo y a sus hijos se dedica a la venta artículos para el hogar (licuadoras, planchas, tostadoras, entre otras cosas), ella en las mañanas se dedica a recorrer por toda la localidad ofreciendo sus productos los mismos que deja a crédito y que cobra cada fin de semana, pero en las tardes instala una mesa en las afueras de su casa y allí vende las deliciosas empanadas de verde, mochines de yuca, corviches y gaseosas, trabaja todos los días y lleva realizando esta actividad por tres años, ella empezó su negocio con uno de los créditos que recibió de la institución.

Este crédito es para comprar planchas, licuadoras y víveres para elaborar los bocadillos. Lleva 11 años en el Banco Comunal y le gusta por la ayuda que le han dado para poder comenzar en sus negocios.
 
Su sueño es ver realizados a sus hijos.
texts.en:
The “4 de Noviembre” communal bank meets every two weeks in “Los Bajos de Montecristi,” a town known for its grand diversity and typical products such as straw hats known within and outside the country.

Manuela lives here.  She is 44 years old, is in a common law marriage and has three children, ages 18, 13, and 12.  They all attend school.  Her husband is a bus dispatcher.
 
Manuela sells household goods (blenders, irons, toasters, and other things) in order to earn a living and help out her husband and children.  By morning she travels all around her neighborhood, selling her products on credit and collecting every weekend.  In the evenings she sets up tables outside her home and sells delicious vegetable empanadas, yucca mochines, corviches, and soft drinks.  She works daily and has been doing this for three days.  She started this business with one of the loans she got through the institution.

She will use the money from this loan to buy irons, blenders, and ingredients for making snacks.  She’s been a part of the communal bank for 11 years and she enjoys it because of the help she has gotten to start her businesses.

Her dream is to see her children succeed.

loans.use: to buy inventory for her business.

loans.name: Lidia Alexandra

texts.es:
En Los Bajos de Montecristi, ciudad conocida por su gran diversidad de productos típicos, como por ejemplo los sombreros de paja toquillas conocidos dentro y fuera del país se reúnen cada 15  días las socias del Banco Comunal 4 De Noviembre.

En este lugar vive la señora Lidia, tiene 34 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen tres hijos de 10, 8 y 2 años, los  dos mayores estudian en la escuela. Su esposo es comerciante. 

Doña Lidia es una mujer muy luchadora que le gusta valerse por sí misma para ganar su sustento y también para ayudar a su marido con los gastos del hogar, ella tiene una pequeña fábrica de botones y fue con la ayuda de los créditos que compro lo necesario para poder comenzar su negocio, en la actualidad cuenta con dos maquinas que sirven para elaborar estos productos. Todas las semanas ella entrega a comerciantes que luego los venden a exportadores en la ciudad de Manta para que estos los lleven a otros países y les den el terminado a los botones. Ella trabaja de lunes a sábado con la ayuda de una hermana a quien le paga un sueldo mensual. Lleva cuatro años con su negocio y le va muy bien.

Este crédito es para comprar tagua y otros mariales para elaborar los botones. Lleva siete años en el Banco Comunal y le gusta porque gracias a los créditos ella pudo comprar lo necesario para poner su fábrica.

Su sueño es tener una empresa mucho más grande y maquinarias para dar un producto terminado.
texts.en:
In the city of Los Bajos de Montecristi, a city known for its great diversity of local products such as straw hats known in and outside of the country, members of the Novenber 4th Communal Bank members meet every 15 days. 
Here lives Mrs. Lidia who is 34 years old, married, and has 3 children of 10, 8, and 2 years of age. The two oldest go to school. Her husband is a businessman.
Mrs. Lidia is a very hardworking woman and likes to make do for herself when it comes to having an income to help her husband with household expenses. She has a small button factory and it was with prior loans that she was able to buy materials needed to start her business. At the moment, she has two machines to make buttons. Every week she delivers her product to sellers who sell her product to exporters in Manta city to finish fabricating the buttons. She works from Monday to Saturday with a sister's help and pays her a monthly salary. She has been working in this business for 4 years and it is going very well. 
She will use this loan to buy ivory palm and other materials needed to fabricate buttons. She has been a part of the Communal Bank for 7 years and thanks to the loans has been able to buy materials she needs for her shop.
Her dream is to have a bigger business and machinery to have a finished production.

loans.use: buy ivory palm and other materials needed to fabricate buttons

loans.name: Erika Mariuxi

texts.es:
En Los Bajos de Montecristi, ciudad conocida por su gran diversidad de productos típicos, como por ejemplo los sombreros de paja toquillas conocidos dentro y fuera del país se reúnen cada 15  días las socias del Banco Comunal 4 De Noviembre.

En este lugar vive la señora Erika, tiene 24 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen tres hijos de 8, 6 y 5 años de edad, los dos mayores estudian en escuela. Su esposo se dedica al comercio.

Ella para ayudar a su esposo realiza el crédito para que él invierta en su negocio, él se dedica a la venta de frutas y legumbres, tiene un puesto en un Mercado de Manta en el cual trabaja todos los días desde las 05h00 hasta las 14h00 o hasta que haya vendido todos sus productos, para abastecerse de los productos se desplaza al mercado mayorista donde compra lo que necesita para la venta diaria, lleva más de 5 años con este negocio el cual les permite salir adelante.
 
Este nuevo crédito es para comprar legumbres, frutas y verduras. Este es su cuarto ciclo en el Banco Comunal y le gusta por la ayuda que le dan con los créditos.
 
Su sueño es tener un carro para que su esposo venda sus productos.
texts.en:
In Los Bajos de Montecristi, a city known for its wide array of typical products, such as the straw hats and shawls which are recognised both at home and abroad, the members of the all-female 4 de Noviembre Communal Bank meet every two weeks.

One of the members is Erika. She is 24 and is married with three children aged 8, 6 and 5. The older two children are at school. Her husband is a businessman.

To help her husband, Erika obtains loans for him to invest in his business, which is selling fruits and vegetables. He has a stall at a market in Manta and works there every day from 5am to 2pm or until he has sold all his products. He gets his stock from the wholesale market where he buys what he needs to sell each day. He has had this business for more than five years and it allows them to get by.
 
This new loan is to buy pulses, fruits and vegetables. This is Erika's fourth cycle with the Communal Bank and she likes it because of the help she gets with the loans.
 
Her dream is to own a car for her husband to use to sell his products.

loans.use: to buy pulses, fruits and vegetables.

loans.name: Sabrina Del Rosario

texts.es: La joven Sabrina tiene 23 años de edad, de oficio cajera desde hace un año en un supermercado, no tiene hijos aun,  habita en casa de sus padres con su esposo quien trabaja como taxista, de esa manera ambos salen adelante. Ella solicita el crédito  para la construcción de un anexo de cuarto en casa de sus padres para obtener mayor privacidad Sabrina y su marido, por lo que le urge la construcción de su habitación por esta razón está solicitando este primer crédito con un monto de 15,000 córdobas para poder comprar materiales de construcción como lo son cemento, arena, hierro, bloques, piedrines y pagar la mano de obra.
texts.en: Sabrina is 23 and has been working as a cashier in a supermarket for the last year. She has no children yet, and lives in her parents' house with her husband who is a taxi driver, so that the two of them can get ahead. She is requesting a loan to build an extra room onto her parents' home so that she and her husband can have more privacy. For this reason she is requesting her first loan of 15,000 córdobas to be able to buy construction materials such as cement, sand, iron, cinderblocks and gravel and to pay labour costs.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, iron, cinderblocks and gravel and to pay labour costs to build an extra room.

loans.name: Suzana Elizabeth

texts.es:
El Banco Comunal Unión Y Desarrollo se reúne cada quince días en la ciudadela las Orquídeas de la ciudad de Portoviejo. Lugar conocido por la calidez de su gente y por su empuje para salir adelante.

En este lugar vive la señora Suzana, tiene 30 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene un  hijo de 4 años de edad. El marido es comerciante.
 
Ella se dedica a la venta de ropa de todo tipo, zapatos y sandalias, su forma de  venta es puerta a puerta y también vende en la  casa donde vive pero solo a sus clientes más conocidos, trabaja todos los días y todo el dia ya que vende en su casa también, deja a crédito a sus clientes  y cobra cada quince u ocho días. Su mercadería  la va a comprar a Guayaquil y de repente en Colombia. Tiene más de 6  años que se dedica a esta actividad y le va muy bien.

Este crédito es para comprar ropa, zapatos, carteras y otros accesorios de damas. Está en el Banco Comunal hace tres años y  le gusta porque los intereses son más bajos que en otras instituciones de crédito.
 
Su sueño es tener casa propia pues donde vive es alquilado.
texts.en:
The communal bank "Unión Y Desarrollo" meets every 15 days in the "las Orquídeas" residential community of the city of Portoviejo, a place known for the warmth of its people and its initiative to move forward. 

In this place there lives Suzana. She is 30 years old and maintains a civil union relationship from which she has a 4-year-old son. The husband is a merchant.

She sells clothing of all types, shoes, and sandals. Her manner of selling is door-to-door and she also sells in the house where she lives but only to her better-known customers. She works everyday and all day now that she sells in her home as well. She leaves her customers on credit and collects every 8 or 15 days. She is going to buy her merchandise from Guayaquil and soon from Colombia. She has been doing this activity for more than 6 years and it is going very well for her. 

This loan is to buy women's clothing, shoes, purses, and other accessories. She has been with the communal bank for 3 years and she likes it because the interest rates are lower than in other credit institutions. 

Her dream is to own her own home since where she lives is rented.

loans.use: to buy women's clothing, shoes, purses, and accessories.

loans.name: Mi Banquito Group

texts.es: Grupo formado por cinco socias microempresarias emprendedoras que llevan varios prestamos con la institución una de las socias es María Luisa que tiene una pulpería inicio su negocio vendiendo cosméticos Avon, ropa usadas desde hace tres años, es mujer casada y con tres hijos menores, el crédito lo invertirá en la compra de granos básicos como arroz, frijoles, azúcar, aceite, jabón de baños, jabón de lavar ropa, embutidos, avena, cafés, etc., además invertirá en cosméticos como perfumen, crema para el cuerpo y manos, entre otros. Vilma Vende hielo al por mayor en su casa así también como nacatamales, choco bananos y helados, Rosa Emilia tiene una pulpería en su domicilio, Engracia  vende ropa y cosméticos ambulantes en los diferentes mercados de la capital y María Auxiliadora vende cosméticos, tiene un pequeño taller de costura que actualmente fabrica sabanas, ropa de niña en serie, ropa de cama, cojines etc.
texts.en: A group made up of five enterprising micro-entrepreneurs who have had various loans with the organization.  One of the members is Maria Luisa, who has a grocery store.  She began her business selling Avon cosmetics and used clothing three years ago.  She is a married woman with three minor children.  She will invest her loan to buy goods such as rice, beans, sugar, oil, bath soap, laundry soap, sausage, oats, coffee, etc.  She will also buy cosmetics such as perfume, creams for the body and hands, and other things.  Vilma sells wholesale ice from her home, as well as tamales and ice cream treats.  Rosa Emilia has a grocery store in her home.  Engracia sells clothing and cosmetics from various markets in the capital.  Maria Auxiliadora sells cosmetics, and has a small dressmaking shop that makes sheets, children's clothing, sleepwear and cushions, etc.

loans.use: to buy goods for her grocery store.

loans.name: Flerida Mallita

texts.es:
El Banco Comunal Unión Y Desarrollo se reúne cada quince días en la ciudadela las Orquídeas de la ciudad de Portoviejo. Lugar conocido por la calidez de su gente y por su empuje para salir adelante.

En este lugar vive la señora Flerida, tiene 38 años de edad, está casada pero aun no ha podido tener hijos. Su esposo es empleado público.

Ella una ama de casa que para obtener sus propios recursos se dedica a la venta de ropa por catalogo y productos de Yanbal, Avon y Esika (productos de belleza, cosméticos, perfumería y accesorios para damas). Trabaja todos los  días unas tres horas por día, visita a sus clientes en las tardes o noches ya que allí las encuentra cuando llegan de sus trabajos lo que le facilita sus ventas, deja sus productos a crédito y cobra cada semana. Lleva cuatro años dedicada  a esta actividad y le ha ido muy  bien.
 
Este crédito es para comprar perfumes, cremas, cosméticos y ropa de todo tipo. Esta desde el inicio en el banco comunal y le gusta por la ayuda que le dan con los créditos.
 
Su sueño es seguir adelante en su negocio.
texts.en:
The Union and Development Communal Bank meets every 15 days in the tenement block Orquídeas in Portoviejo city. This place is known for its inhabitant's warmth and enthusiasm to thrive.

Here Mrs. Flerida lives. She is 38 years old, married, and has yet to have any children. Her husband is a public worker.

She is a housewife and helps financially by selling catalog clothes and Yambal, Avon, and Esika products (beauty products, cosmetics, perfumes, and women's accessories.) She works three hours everyday. She visits her clients in the afternoons and evenings since they are available after work. She takes credit and receives the payments weekly. She has been working in this business for 4 years and it has been going very well.

This loan will be used to buy perfumes, creams, cosmetics, and all types of clothes. She has been with the communal bank since it started and enjoys it since help is offered with loans. Her dream is to succeed with her business.

loans.use: buy perfumes, creams, cosmetics, and all types of clothes.

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es:
El Banco Comunal Unión Y Desarrollo se reúne cada quince días en la ciudadela las Orquídeas de la ciudad de Portoviejo. Lugar conocido por la calidez de su gente y por su empuje para salir adelante.

En este lugar vive el señor Juan, tiene 31 años de edad, está soltero pero tiene un hijo de siete años que vive con la mamá y estudia en la escuela. Lleva un año  en el Banco Comunal y le gusta por la ayuda y facilidad para conseguir los créditos.

Él se dedica al comercio, vende ropa de todo tipo y su forma de venta es puerta a puerta, recorre la ciudad ofreciendo sus prendas sus clientes y los fines de semana se desplaza a cantones cercanos para así aprovechar los días de feria que es cuando mas vende, trabaja todos los días, deja a crédito a sus clientes  y cobra cada quince o cada ocho días. Su mercadería la va a comprar a Guayaquil cada vez que necesita. Tiene más de 3  años que se dedica a esta actividad y le va muy bien.

Este crédito es para comprar pantalones, camisetas y ropa interior.

Sus sueños son tener su casa propia pues donde vive es alquilado y seguir aumentando sus ventas.
texts.en:
The communal bank "Unión Y Desarrollo" meets every 15 days in the "las Orquídeas" residential community of the city of Portoviejo, a place known for the warmth of its people and its initiative to move forward. 

In this place there lives Juan. He is 31 years old and single, but he has a 7-year-old son who lives with the mother and goes to school. He has been with the communal bank for 1 year and he likes it because of the assistance and ease of obtaining loans. 

He works in business, selling all types of clothing and his manner of selling is door-to-door. He goes around the city offering his garments to customers, and on the weekends, he travels to nearby cantons to take advantage of fair days which is when he sells the most. He works everyday. He leaves his customers on credit and collects every 10 or 15 days. He is going to buy his merchandise from Guayaquil each time that he needs it. He has been doing this activity for more than 3 years and it is going very well for him.

This loan is to buy pants, undershirts, and underwear. 

His dreams are to have his own home since where he lives is rented and to keep increasing his sales.

loans.use: to buy pants, undershirts, and underwear.

loans.name: Andrea Auxiliadora

texts.es:
El Banco Comunal Unión Y Desarrollo se reúne cada quince días en la ciudadela las Orquídeas de la ciudad de Portoviejo. Lugar conocido por la calidez de su gente y por su empuje para salir adelante.

En este lugar vive la señora Andrea, tiene 50 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen cinco hijos, tres de ellos son mayores de edad y dos de 16 y 15 años los mismos que estudian en colegio y son los que aun vive con ella. Su esposo es pintor.

Doña Andrea para salir adelante junto a su familia y con esto ayudar a su esposo con los gastos del hogar tiene una tienda de víveres en su casa, allí vende todo tipo de productos como arroz, azúcar, aceites, detergentes, legumbres, verduras frutas y ciertos artículos de bazar y papelería, a ella le gusta tener bien surtida su tienda y tener de todo ya que así gana mucha mas clientela ya que sus clientes encuentran de todo en su local,  trabaja todos los días desde las 6h00 hasta las 20h00 y a veces hasta más tarde, sus hijos y su esposo le ayudan en su trabajo cuando ellos pueden y están desocupados. Tiene más de 4 años con su negocio y le va muy bien.

Este crédito lo va a emplear en surtir mas su tienda, va a comprar arroz, azúcar, aceite, detergentes, embutidos y otros productos de primera necesidad. Está en el Banco Comunal casi desde el inicio  y le gusta por la ayuda que le dan los créditos. 

Sus metas son seguir adelante y que sus hijos sean buenos profesionales.
texts.en:
The communal bank "Unión Y Desarrollo" meets every 15 days in the "las Orquídeas" residential community of the city of Portoviejo, a place known for the warmth of its people and its initiative to move forward.

In this place lives Andrea. She is 50 years old and married. From this marriage, she has five children, three of which are adults, and two aged 15 and 16 who go to school and still live with her. Her husband is a painter. 

In order to move ahead with her family and help her husband with home expenses, Andrea has a grocery store in her house. There, she sells all types of products such as rice, sugar, oils, detergents, legumes, fruits, vegetables, and certain stationery goods. She likes to have her store well-stocked and to have everything as that is how she earns many more customers since her customers find everything in her store. She works everyday from 6:00 A.M. until 8:00 P.M. and at times even later. Her children and husband help her in her store when they able to and are free. She has more than 4 years with this business and it is going very well for her. 

She will use this loan to further stock her store. She is going to buy rice, sugar, oil, sausage, detergents, and other staples. She has been with the communal bank since almost its beginning and she likes it for the assistance that the loans give her.

Her goals are to keep moving forward and that her children become good professionals.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, oil, sausage, detergents, and other staples.

loans.name: Los Gavilanes Group

texts.es: Microempresarios exitosos formados por tres socios  Eveling  es una de las empresarias que vende tacos de madera, palos de maderas para cepillos de lavar hecho con material  de reciclajes, además vende palos de plásticos que sirve para hacer escobas que se utilizan para el aseo de los hogares, esta actividad la viene realizando desde 15 años es mujer casada con 36 años de edad y tiene tres hijos menores. En el negocio su esposo le ayuda a vender y cuenta con un trabajador, el crédito lo invertirá en la compra de materia prima como plásticos para hacer cepillos, palos de madera para hacer escobas, Francisco  de 44 años de edad vende cepillos en los mercados de la capital ambulante y María de 33 años de edad vende raspados ambulante en los diferentes barrios de la capital.
texts.en: This group of successful micro-entrepreneurs is formed by three members. Eveling is an entrepreneur who sells wooden planks, wooden sticks for cleaning brushes, and recycled materials. In addition, she sells plastic sticks used to make brooms used in house cleaning. She has been in this business for 15 years. She is 36 years old, married, and has 3 small children. Her husband and another worker help her with sales. She will use the loan to buy essential materials such as plastics to make brushes and wooden sticks to make brooms. Francisco is 44 years old and sells brushes in markets in the city by foot. Maria is 33 years old and sells shaved ice by foot in the different neighborhoods of the capital.

loans.use: buy materials such as plastics to make brushes and wooden sticks to make brooms, etc.

loans.name: Reyna Sulema

texts.es: Doña Reyna es una clienta que está optando por su octavo préstamo ella es casada su esposo ha trabajado como guarda de seguridad pero en la actualidad está desempleado por lo que ella sostiene el hogar y un hijo que la apoya económicamente, Reyna tiene una actividad comercial de venta de ropa nueva desde hace 6 años, en esta ocasión solicita crédito a Afodenic y Kiva para la construcción del muro frontal de su casa para que su propiedad tenga mayor privacidad, por esta razón necesita comprar materiales como cemento, arena, bloques hierro, piedrines y pagar la mano de obra.
texts.en:
Reyna is a client that is applying for her eighth loan. She is married. Her husband has worked as a security guard but currently is unemployed. Therefore, she maintains the home and a son helps her economically. 

Reyna has been selling new clothing as a commercial activity for 6 years. On this occasion, she is requesting a loan from Afodenic and Kiva for the construction of a front wall for her house so that her property has greater privacy. For this reason, she needs to buy materials such as cement, sand, iron, gravel, and to pay for the labor costs.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, iron, gravel, and blocks and to pay the labor costs for the construction of a front wall

loans.name: San Antonio Group

texts.es: Microempresarias formadas por tres socias se dedica la socia Rosa a elaborar tortillas y frijoles cocidos desde hace 20 años es una mujer acompañada tiene 38 años de edad y dos hijos. Cuenta con un trabajador que le paga en la fábrica de tortillas, el crédito lo invertirá en la compra de maíz, leña, frijoles , Oneyda vende ropa nueva y variada, cosméticos de la Avon y Adilia tiene una pulpería en su domicilio.
texts.en: Microempresarias  was formed by three members. Rosa has made tortillas and cooked beans for 20 years. She is  38 years old, married and the mother of two children. She has a worker that she pays to make the tortillas. She will invest the loan in buying corn, firewood, and beans. Oneyda sells clothes and various Avon cosmetics and Adilia has a store in her home.

loans.use: to invest in buying corn, firewood, raw beans, etc.

loans.name: Cumplidas Group

texts.es: Este grupo está formado por tres socias emprendedoras una de ellas es Concepción de 40 años de edad  quien tiene un comedor en su domicilio actividad que viene realizando desde hace 4 años, tiene dos hijos es madre soltera tanto su mama y su hijo le ayudan en el negocio, el crédito lo invertirá en la compra de granos como arroz, frijoles, azúcar, aceite, carne de res , carne de pollo, verduras, perecederos además en la compra de activos fijos como mesa, sillas plásticas y mejorar la infra estructura de la cocina donde prepara el producto. Gyovania entrega almuerzos a un centro de salud cercano a la comunidad donde habita y Silvia tiene una pulpería en su domicilio.
texts.en: This group is made up of three enterprising women.  Concepción is 40 years old and runs an eatery out of her home.  She’s been doing this for four years and she’s also the single mother of two children who help her with her business.  She will use the money from this loan to buy grains such as rice, beans, sugar, cooking oil, beef, chicken, vegetables, and other perishables.  She will also buy tables, plastic chairs, and will improve her kitchen’s infrastructure.  Gyovania delivers lunches to a nearby health care center in her community.  Silvia runs a general store out of her home.

loans.use: to buy ingredients, tables and chairs.

loans.name: Por La Gracia De Dios Group

texts.es: Grupo formado por tres socias emprendedoras una de ellas es María Mercedes mujer de 40 años de edad, casada con un hijo quien tiene un negocio de una pulpería desde hace 7 años, ella misma atiende su negocio ya que su hija es menor de edad, el crédito lo invertirá en la compra de granos básicos como arroz, frijoles, azúcar, aceite, carne de res, carnes de pollo, avena, sopas magi, embutidos, productos lácteos como crema acida, leche en bolsa etc. Yadira vende mercadería en general como ropa, calzado, cosmético y Mariana vende fritanga por las noches en su domicilio.
texts.en: This group is made up of 3 entrepreneurs. One of them is María Mercedes who is 40 years old, married, with a son who has had a grocery store for the past 7 years. She also has a business since she still has a daughter who depends on her. She will use the loan to buy grains such as rice, beans, sugar, oil, pork, chicken, oatmeal, soups, magi sauce, canned goods, dairy products such as sour cream, milk, etc. Yadira sells merchandise such as clothing, shoes, cosmetics, and Mariana sells fried food at night from her home.

loans.use: buy grains such as rice, beans, sugar, oil, pork, chicken

loans.name: Esfuerzo Tenaz Group

texts.es:
Grupo formado por tres socios emprendedores uno de ellos es, 
Jenny del Carmen mujer de 34 años con tres hijos es una microempresaria que se dedica a la venta de comida, refrescos naturales en un kiosco escolar cercano a su domicilio, tiene 8 años de tener el negocio, sus hijos  le ayudan en la atención del negocio , el crédito lo invertirá en la compra de granos básicos como arroz, frijoles, azúcar, aceite, carne de pollo, carne de res, gaseosas entre otras cosas relacionado con su actividad, Angela del Socorro vende productos lácteos al por mayor y al detalle en un mercado local de su comunidad y Gerald tiene una pulpería en su domicilio.
texts.en: This group is made up of three entrepreneurial members.  One of them is Jenny del Carmen, a 34 year-old woman with three children.  She is a small business owner who earns a living selling food and natural beverages in a kiosk near her home that caters to school children.  She has had the business for eight years.  Her children help her mind the business.  The loan will be invested in the purchase of basic grains such as rice, beans, sugar, oil, chicken, beef, and soft drinks among other things related to her activities.  Angela del Socorro sells dairy products, wholesale and retail in the local community market.  Gerald has a small grocery store in his home.

loans.use: to buy grains such as rice, beans, sugar, beef, chicken, etc.

loans.name: Esperanza De La Concepcion's Group

texts.es: Grupo formado por tres socias una de ellas es Ana que es microempresaria y medico su negocio es venta de medicamentos populares y brindar atención médica a la comunidad con precios justos quien ya es muy reconocida por su trabajo, en  esta actividad tiene 10 años  de estar ejerciendo, el crédito lo invertirá en la compra de medicamentos y hacer unas pequeñas mejoras al local para brindarle mejor confort a los pacientes, Esperanza vende cosméticos y Norma vende nacatamales, cerdos en pie y compra cosechas de tamarindo.
texts.en: A group made up of three members, one of whom is Ana.  She is a micro-entrepreneur whose business is the sale of popular medicines and the provision of medical care to her community at fair prices.  She is already well known for her work, as she has been doing it for 10 years.  She will use the loan to buy medicines and make some improvements to her business premises to make her patients more comfortable.  Esperanza sells tamales and live pigs, and buys tamarind harvests.

loans.use: to buy popular medicines.

loans.name: Norma Del Carmen

texts.es: Norma del Carmen tiene un tramo de zapatos variados en un mercado local cercano a su domicilio desde hace 6 años, es una mujer soltera con un hijo que le ayuda en el negocio  tiene 63 años de edad y el crédito lo invertirá en la compra de zapatos deportivo, zapatos de cueros para todas las edades, estilo, tamaño y sexo.
texts.en: Norma del Carmen has a section in a local market near her home where she has sold a variety of shoes for 6 years.  She is a single woman with one son who helps her with the business.  She is 63 years old and the loan will be invested in the purchase of athletic shoes and leather shoes for both males and females of all ages, in various styles and sizes.

loans.use: to buy leather shoes, athletic shoes of all brands, etc.

loans.name: Meglin Elibet

texts.es: Meglin mujer de 23 años, casada con un hijo menor, su negocio es un tramo de ropas nueva, ropa interior, juguetes actividad que tiene desde hace 4 años, el crédito lo invertirá en la compra de pólvora por la temporada de la purísima y la navidad ya  que esto  le permite tener un ingreso extra para aumentar su negocio y así  mantener a su familia.
texts.en: Meglin is a 23-year-old married woman with one young child.  Her business, which she has had for 4 years, involves new clothing, underwear and activity toys.  She will use the loan to buy fireworks for the Immaculate Conception festivities and the Christmas season because this will allow her to have some extra income to grow her business and maintain her family.

loans.use: to buy fireworks such as rockets, mortars and others.

loans.name: Reyna Elizabeth

texts.es: Reyna mujer de 32 años madre soltera con dos hijos se dedica a vender comida en su domicilio desde hace 3 años. Inicio su negocio vendiendo refrescos naturales, y nacatamales. Actualmente su mama le ayuda en el negocio y  el crédito lo invertirá en la compra de materia prima como arroz, frijoles, azúcar, aceite, carne de pollo, carne de res, verduras etc.
texts.en: Reyna is 32 years old, a single mother, and has two children. She has been selling meals from her home for a living for three years. She started her business selling natural flavored sodas and tamales. At the moment, her mother helps her with the business. She will use the loan to buy ingredients such as rice, beans, sugar, oil, chicken, beef, vegetables, etc.

loans.use: buy ingredients such as rice, beans, sugar, oil, chicken, beef, vegetables, etc.

loans.name: Roberto

texts.es:
Don Roberto tiene 54 años de edad. Él se dedica a la agricultura desde hace varios años, aprendió junto con su padre. Se levanta a las 4:30 a.m. para dirigirse al terreno donde tiene sus cultivos de maíz y fríjol. Allí pasa el mayor tiempo, luego se dirige hacia su casa a realizar actividades hogareñas ya que su esposa lo abandono y sus hijos ya viven con sus respectivas familias. 

El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para comprar tres novillas. Para que se conviertan en vacas y obtener leche para venderla. Su deseo, es comprar más vacas para elaborar lácteos y tener otra fuente de ingresos.
texts.en: Roberto is 54 years old.  He has worked in agriculture for a number of years, having learned it from his father.  He gets up at 4:30 a.m. to go to the field where his corn and bean crops are.  He spends most of his time there, and later goes home to do the household chores because his wife abandoned him and his children now live with their own families.  The loan that he is requesting is to buy three heifers, which he will raise to produce milk to sell.  His wish is to buy more cows to produce dairy products and have another source of income.

loans.use: to buy three heifers.

loans.name: Alejandro Gonzalo

texts.es:
Alejandro tiene 28 años de edad, es casado y tiene dos hijos. Él se dedica a su negocio de molinero, lo aprendió de sus padres. Inicia sus labores a las 4:30 a.m. a limpiar el molino para tenerlo listo cuando lleguen sus clientes a las 6:00 a.m. esta actividad la realiza durante todo el día. 

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar un vehículo. Debido a que en el lugar donde vive el servicio de transporte colectivo es bastante deficiente. Con la compra del vehiculo, podrá transportarse sin problemas a adquirir los repuestos del molino, para no perder tiempo ni clientes. Su deseo, es comprar un molino más, para obtener mejores ingresos económicos que ayuden a su familia con los gastos.
texts.en: Alejandro is 28 years old, and is married with two children.  He works as a miller, which he learned from his parents.  He begins work at 4:30 a.m. by cleaning the mill to have it ready when his customers arrive at 6:00 a.m.  He does this work all day.  The loan that he is requesting through Fundacion Campo is to buy a vehicle.  With the purchase of a vehicle he will be able to get around without problems, and to acquire supplies for the mill, so that he will not waste time or lose clients.  His wish is to buy another mill, in order to have more income which will help his family with their expenses.

loans.use: to buy a vehicle.

loans.name: Eligio Fuentes

texts.es:
El señor es trabajador de una institución estatal, empresa con la que tiene más de 12 años de tener convenio empresarial, este convenio consta en que le ofrecemos financiamientos a los trabajadores para cubrir sus necesidades y la empresa se encarga de deducirles de planilla dicho abono.

El señor  solicitaba el financiamiento para compra de medicinas para una hija que tiene capacidades diferentes.
texts.en:
Eligio Fuentes is a municipal institution.  This institution has had an agreement with the city for over 12 years; offering loans to the workers in order to cover their expenses, and the city deducts these loans from the workers' salaries.
This man is requesting a loan for the purchase of medicine for a disabled daughter.

loans.use: to buy medicine for one of his daughters.

loans.name: Margarita Verónica

texts.es:
La señora Margarita Veronica es comerciante de unos de los mercados de Chinandega desde  hace 21 años en su negocio vende de todo un poco como: productos plásticos, de maderas, artesanía etc.

La señora Jirón es casada madre de tres niños los cuales están en edad escolar dos de ellos, la menor es una niña que la mete en un CDI en el mercado central mientras ella labora fuertemente en su negocio para llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar.

El financiamiento lo solicita para compra de mercadería para su negocio ya que se aproxima la temporada de Navidad.
texts.en: Margarita Veronica has been a merchant at one of Chinandega's markets for 21 years. As a business, she sells a little of everything : plastic and wood items, crafts, etc. Margarita is married. She has three children, two of whom go to school; she takes the youngest one to a preschool in the main market, while she works hard in her business in order to bring her household their daily bread. She is requesting financing to purchase merchandise for her business to prepare for the Christmas season.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise such as tiles, plates, glasses, cutlery

loans.name: Juan Jose

texts.es:
El señor Juan Jose trabaja como diseñador grafico en la imprenta mas antigua de Chinandega el señor juan  es hijo del dueño pero ahí cada quien hace su trabajo como un trabajador mas. Son asalariado, trabajan de lunes a sábado.

don Juan es casado tiene una niña que estudia en primaria por la cual se esfuerza para proporcionar lo necesario. Y salir adelante el también como persona ya que es se encuentra estudiando en la universidad, es por tal motivo que solicita financiamientos para cubrir gastos de la universidad el es un cliente excelente paga sus financiamientos muy bien.
texts.en:
Juan Jose works as a graphic designer in old printing house of Chinadega. He is the son of the owner but everyone has their own work there. They are salaried and work from Monday to Saturday.

Juan Jose is married and has a daughter who studies in elementary school where he works hard to move forward. He also moves forward as a person by studying at a university. This is his reason to ask for financing: to cover university expenses. He is an excellent client who pays back his financing very well.

loans.use: to cover his university's expenses.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to install water pipes in her house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to build a wall around his house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to make improvements to his home.

loans.name: Graciela

texts.es:
La señora Graciela esta casada con el señor Juan y tiene dos hijos que están estudiando la primaria.
Esta solicitando el préstamo para los acabados de la recamara de sus hijos ya que les falta la pintura y el vitropiso, pero no cuenta con el dinero necesario para realizar la mejora.
La señora Graciela es empleado de una compañía de trasportes en el aria de documentadora y su esposo trabaja para una fábrica en el aria de coordinador de producción. Con el sueldo que recibe la señora Graciela será para pagar el crédito y con el ingreso de su esposo el señor Juan es para los gastos familiares y escolares
Desean que sus hijos tengan su propio espacio y mejorar la calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Graciela is married to Juan and they have two children who are in elementary school.  They are requesting the loan for the finishing touches for their children’s room as it is lacking paint and ceramic tile, but they don’t have the money necessary to complete the improvements.  

Graciela is employed as a documentation specialist at a transportation company and her husband works for a factory as a production coordinator.  The salary Graciela receives will be for paying the loan and the income from her husband Juan is for the family and school expenses.  

They desire for their children to have their own space and to improve the quality of life.

loans.use: to complete the finishing touches inside [her children's room].

loans.name: María Concepción

texts.es:
La señora María Concepción esta agradecida por su cooperación en el anterior crédito el cual fue para invertir en su negocio.
Es nuevamente solicitando un préstamo para la compra de mercancía de temporada navideña, ya que es el mes que tiene mas ventas. Desea invertir en mercancía como es juguetes, aparatos eléctricos y ropa de invierno, ya que tiene varios pedidos de sus clientes y quiere entregar la mercancía a tiempo pero no cuenta con el dinero necesario para invertir y no quiere descapitalizar su negocio.
La señora María Concepción es madre soltera y tiene tres hijos ya dos están casados y solo uno vive con ella y es quien le ayuda atender el negocio, y también estudia y trabaja, para ayudar a su mama con los gastos que tiene en la casa. 
Espera contar con su cooperación en este crédito, el cual pagara con las ganancias que obtiene de su negocio.
texts.en:
María Concepción is grateful to the cooperative for the previous loan which she invested in her business.

She is asking for a new loan in order to buy seasonal merchandise for Christmas.  Her sales are greatest this month.  She wants to buy toys, electronics, and winter clothing.  She has several orders from her customers and she wants to deliver the merchandise on time, but she doesn’t have the money to invest and she doesn’t want to put her business into a deficit.

María Concepción is the single mother of three children, two of whom are married and only one who lives with her and helps tend to the business.  He also attends school and works to help his mother with the household expenses.

She is hoping for your cooperation with this loan, which she will repay with her earnings from the business.

loans.use: to buy seasonal merchandise.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth is a 48-year-old trader. She is a single parent of three children who by God’s grace are now living on their own. She joined ID Ghana in 2010 and is still doing very good in all of her endeavors.

She was married for the past 30 years before her husband took ill and later died. She is an individual member who meets her repayment on Tuesdays.

She trades in fresh fish (tilapia). She gets her goods from Akosombo on large scale which she sells to both individuals and chop bars (restaurants). 

She has 16 years of experience in the business. Though things sometimes do not go well in business, she always thanks ID Ghana for all the support giving to her both training and the loan. God bless ID Ghana. 

This is her 6th loan which she is requesting for an amount of 800 Ghanian cedis (GHS) to help her buy more fish (tilapia) to sell to her customers and to expand the business.

loans.use: to buy more fish and sell to customers in her community.

loans.name: Matluba

texts.ru: Матлуба, женщина в возрасте 46 лет.  Проживает в сельской местности , замужем и имеет одного ребенка. Матлуба не имеет высшего образования. Она  занимается купле-продажей моющих средств и хозяйственных товаров  на рынке своего села. Муж ее занимается мелким ремонтом квартир,  но основной доход у них в семье от бизнеса Матлубы.  Она старается развивать свой бизнес и увеличить ассортимент товара.  На полученный кредит Матлуба планирует закупить моющие средства и хозяйственные товары.    Этот кредит ей очень поможет при развитии ее бизнеса.  Матлуба очень благодарна Арванд за поддержку и понимание.
texts.en: Matluba is a woman who is 46 years old.  She lives in a village and she is married with one child.  Matluba does not have a higher education.  She buys and sells soaps, detergents and household goods.  She is trying to increase her business and expand her assortment of goods.  On receiving her loan, Matluba plans on buying cleaning products and household goods.  This loan will greatly help her increase her business.  Matluba is very thankful to Arvand for their support and understanding.

loans.use: to purchase household goods
